description: 19(69) where peace and love never went away!

description: Angels, Shamans, Healers & Yogis Camp offers Burners opportunities  to heal physical, emotional, and spiritual blocks, to allow the expressions of love and creativity to flow.  We offer Burners a variety of ways that assist to open the pathways to their divine expression.

description: Anonymous Village is comprised of Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics Anonymous and all 12 step programs. This is a village where we enjoy being sober and clean and have mega fun. We host 12 step meetings every 3 hours. dances,  bicycle rides and what‚Äôs dreamt up.

AKA: Scarlet/Fire @ the Mars Hotel/Eyes of the World/Dark Star/The Dead Sea/Beyond the Dead"If the doors of perception were cleansed every thing would appear to man as it is, infinite.‚Äù ‚ÄìWilliam Blake

APOKILIPTIKA hosts the Kantina, numerous mutant vehicles, carnivals games, a bike rodeo and good old fashioned doom.  Part of Terminal City village.

name: Bacon Without Borders

Join a higher cause!

name: Black Rock Lemonade
description: Serving the Playa‚Äôs finest lemonade since 1804 !  Ask for an ice shocker to get a special surprise. Bring your own cup , saucer , bowl , dog pan or rubber chicken , or face the wheel of dumb , EERR , doom. Come by thursday night to see Daft Punk ! No for real !

name: Black Rock Syndicate
description: Syndicate; a group of individuals or organizations combined or making a joint effort to undertake some specific duty or carry out specific transactions or negotiation.

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
description: We are a full-service hospitality agency, an FBO, and a legend in our own minds. Come fly with us.

name: BlackRockCityDepartmeantofMobility

name: BLD

name: BLOOP!

description: Now there are more ways than ever for you to connect with people and information in Black Rock City. A dedicated team of artists, coders, and software developers have created tools to help you locate others, schedule and find themecamp events, artwork, and much more. This project is aimed at providing a digital space which encompasses the entire event and community, both in BRC and in archival form, long after the dust has settled.

name: Burning Man Outreach Network
description: Visit the Outreach Network and learn how the Black Rock Arts Foundation, Black Rock Solar, Burners Without Borders and the Burning Man Regional Network are bringing the playa to the world the other 51 weeks of the year! Check the What Where When for hosted cocktail parties, mixers, lectures and interactive art activities.

name: Burning Phone Camp
description: Contact To The Outside World

name: Burningdales Department Store
description: Burningdales Department Store will be providing delectable refreshment to all-comers. As with our previous years offerings (Flying Monkey, Untied Nations Emabssy, Unnatural History Museum) we shall endeavour to regale all our ‚Äòshoppers‚Äô with unlimited refreshment and music and entertainment galore.

name: Burntown Heights
description: It is Burntown‚Äôs intention to create a camp that not only draws others in, but also makes its members more comfortable staying than leaving. If we are constantly faced with the dilemma that we are more content to remain in camp then our intentions have been satisfied. Expect the un-expected.

name: Bus Depot Camp
description: Our Bus Depot camp is devoted to those who volunteer during our week at burningman.  It is designed to keep us in close proximity to our work location.

name: BUSTED!
description: At its core Busted! is a refuge from the elements and a place for citizens to gather and share in a relaxed and comfortable environment. Busted! is a neighborhood tea shop for the metropolis of Burning Man, a hangout for people to foster community by telling stories, organizing their next outing

name: C.R.T.T.
description: CRTT in your face again!  We provide 24-hour entertainment with themes changing daily and/or hourly.  Get Spanked, do a jig for a sno-cone, dance your best buffalo bill, bring a model of your camp for Metrodome, make a mutant stuffed animal, or dance in the dust¬ÖWe¬íre always up for entertaining!

name: Cafe Negro
description: An urban cafe for our un-urban Metropolis, featuring everything black from the city, except perhaps the smog. Come enjoy the Cafe and after dark the interactive bicycle art Velo-City.

name: Camp "Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge featuring unprofessional counseling, libelous libations and scornful judgment from our panel of experts. Commiserate with the best as MC Amy Wineho‚Äô keeps your shame in perspective.

name: Camp 11:11
description: Celebrate 11:11‚Äì11:11 is a catalyst to unite people. It‚Äôs a totally vertical moment in time. Make a wish at 11:11. Have a shot, give a kiss, or smoke a smoke at 11:11. Flame on at 11:11. Orgasm at precisely 11:11. Does anyone know what time is it? Its 11:11. Come help us discover 11:11 at Camp 11:11

name: Camp 54
description: Returning to the playa for their 6th year of pirating antics and grog slinging, it‚Äôs Camp 54!  What does it mean?  How would we know, we‚Äôre just pirates‚Ä¶.AARGHH! Bring your own cup by for some grog and visit our ‚ÄúJive Thru‚Äù window for a unique playa experience.

name: Camp Armageddon
description: Armageddon ‚Äì it‚Äôs not the end of the world, it‚Äôs the Safe Word! Armageddon is the cool place to chill, so drop by and set a spell in our living room. Bring your bike too, if it needs some love.

name: Camp Beaverton for Wayward Girls
description: Camp Beaverton for Wayward Girls is a community for Gay & Queer Women, Lesbians, Bisexuals, Dykes, Sluts, Butches, Bois, Transfolk, Bi-curious and beyond. We provide a kick-ass, inclusive queer oasis in BRC for women and a continuing conversation exploring female and feminine queer sexuality.

name: Camp BollyRock
description: Camp Bollyrock is a state of mind and space where one can explore and absorb one of the worlds greatest cultures through the lens of music, film imagery and exchange of energy‚Ä¶

name: Camp by the Ton
description: Out purpose is to live large.  We bring big art and big hearts.

name: Camp Caribbean
description: The love and passion of the Caribbean‚Ä¶Salsa,Merenque, Reggae dancehall and roots‚Ä¶Cuban coffee in the morning and a BIG Cuban Mojito party on Wednesday.

name: Camp Cat Lounge
description: Come chill in the shade at the Camp Cat Lounge, funky cat vibe with a body paint bar, beverage bar and plenty of cat accessories to play with‚Ä¶Meeooow

name: Camp Conduit
description: Camp Conduit ‚Äì gifting sun hats, hemp rope, and knot instruction to the masses.  Camp Conduit rises from the ashes of the disaster-stricken Pepper Conduit of 2008.

name: Camp Contact
description: Camp Contact is devoted to bringing Contact Improvisation Dance and other related somatic practices such as Thai massage, Acro-yoga, authentic movement and more to the playa.  Please join us for classes & workshops at our camp and for Contact Dance in the mornings at Center Camp.

name: camp crazy horse
description: camp crazy horse come ride our full size wooden rocking horses or our pyramix car were seriousley crazy about horse play.

name: Camp Cryo
description: Camp Cryo has descends upon Black Rock City, bringing along ice cream cryogenically frozen to -196 degrees. Using our method of mixology and cryogenic witchcraft we will be serving up arctic treats, hosting a dance party and lectures on life extension through Cryogenics.

name: Camp D.O.A.
description: Have a glass of champagne, wine or a brew in ‚Äù One Eyed Jack‚Äôs Tavern ‚Äù while we chat about anything and everything. Check out our ‚Äù daily specials ‚Äù !! Like rock climbing, mountaineering or kayaking? Come chat with your fellow Decadent Outdoor Adventurers. Dancing, fun and surprises daily !!

name: Camp Do Nothing, Part Deux
description: We are a group of (mostly) veteran burners/performers that have, once again, worked long and hard on the playa year after year to ‚ÄúDO NOTHING, PART DEUX‚Äù this year.  Stop by & say hi, maybe cook us a meal or bring us something from Centre Camp!

name: Camp Gallavant
description: Ahoy from The Pirates Of The Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle, USS Nevada). We Gallavant around the playa spreading fun and adventure through BRC! Visit us, enjoy the Arrgh Bar and hop a ride on a Mutant Vehicle at the #1 loading station for the Un-Official BRC Public Transit System!

name: Camp Gratitude
description: Welcome Black Rock Metropolis inhabitants!! Our camp is an expression of a World of Plenty. We invite you to be a part of what is possible when we keep our attention on all that we have already been given. What are you Grateful for? Through stretching the body, being, heart, voice, and spirit/mind we encourage you to be someone who:1) Loves your life. 2) Adores yourself. 3) Accepts the world. 4) Is generous and grateful every day. 5) Experiences being provided for. Come be clear, Be Love, and enjoy the questions of the day.

name: Camp Here
description: Camp Here: Your home away from home, all grown up and better than you remember. Come relax, have a drink and play with our toys.

name: Camp Herring
description: 5 Norwegians (second smartest beings in the universe) setting up our own camp for you to enjoy. Come to us fully dressed, no protest, and feel the herring-aroma. Free Herring Shots will be served whenever we‚Äôre there. Have a go at riding our rotocycle

name: Camp Hi Society
description: Hi Society is a national collective of burners who bring the taste, feel and sound of the 50s to BRC. Stop by for a martini; play bocce at day or night (our court glows in the dark!) with a friend or a stranger; or just come enjoy the jazz, rock & roll, rhythm & blues and opera of the period. Say Hi!

name: Camp Hook Up
description: Armed with magic hooker cases & their seemingly infinite capacity our playa mission is to hook you up with what you have forgotten or not known you needed. From chapstick & toothbrushes to permission slips & hall passes to petitions & flogging & toys to deviant ploys. You‚Äôll hope we run into you.

name: Camp Illumineye
description: To illuminate, clarify, and enlighten the community on the alchemy of homeopathy and feminine wisdom. Salon Illumineye will host panels and rituals on real healing and wisdom for a sustainable future.

name: Camp Inspiratum
description: Inspiratum is the home of inspiration to build, create, or play.  Come play with the Crossbow Glowstick Shooters, climb the 46‚Ä≤ Lighthouse, relax in a hammock beneath the palm trees or check out the numerous human and otherwise powered machines that live in the outer courtyard.

name: Camp Journeylizm
description: A Media Medium. A Place To Stay While You Create/Work And Socialize.

name: Camp Lepidodgera
description: Camp Lepidodgera is home to the enormous kinetic butterfly, the Lepidodgera.  We also have a gasifier laboratory that converts compostables into electricity for the purpose of demonstrating the old, but relevant technology of gasification.

name: CAMP LITTLE BITTY
description: Are you feeling Little Bitty at Burning Man this year? Our workshop is offering full maintenance and inspection of all mythical creatures and their owners. Costume designers and face painters are on hand to help with your mythical transformation!

name: Camp Make Good Choices
description: There‚Äôs a METROPOLIS of choices in BRC. Camp Make Good Choices is eager to assist you in your endeavors! Visit us to make FurKinis, walk the SpankplanK, join in Improv Comedy, or spin the WheeL of Misfortune!Choose to participate in all?‚Ä¶EXCELLENT CHOICE!Confess bad choices-flaming flogger spanks!

name: Camp Merkin
description: An international camp.  Show off your Merkin!.  We have merkin making supplies, a small cafe with coffee, water or wine when needed and an array of books if you just want to escape for a while and borrow one.

name: Camp Montage
description: Camp Montage uses Art to document Art, creating original works of ‚Äòmontage‚Äô art from the digital images of talented Burning Man photographers.  The 2010 art gallery will display 20 large backlit photographic prints featuring images photographed on the playa from 2005 through 2009.

name: Camp Narc
description: Narc Narc! We‚Äôre back in 2010 raging obnoxiousness like it‚Äôs going out of style. So bring your mug and grab a drink at B-Love‚Äôs Brew Lounge, enjoy a first rate view of the playa from atop Stoop‚Äôs Stoop, or dare to take a ride on The World Famous Traveling Titty-Totter of Terror!!! FCN!

name: Camp of Misfit Toys
description: Camp of Misfit toys is a christmas camp full of misfit toys, a christmas Tree Forest, Christmas Music, Christmas themed events, and Christmas cheer to be spread on the playa. Stop by for a gift exchanget, or just dance to the christmas music. Every Day is christmas.

name: Camp of the Rising Sun
description: Greet each new day with us through dance with daily sunrise music sets (both live and recorded), accompanied by performance, and ceremony. Body painting, healing arts, and a chill vibe begin before dawn and last all day.

name: Camp Overkill
description: Camp Overkill is a large 24 hour interactive theme camp. Our primary interest is combining large sound with a performance area available for use by all Black Rock City citizens.

name: Camp Pendant
description: Camp Pendant has gone back to its roots by is spreading its wings. Join us for Boozy Bunko, Polish Horseshoes, and the Black Rock City Un-Marathon. Our annual Gifting Tree with new Metropolis pendants and the best conversation on the Playa await you!

name: Camp Photon
description: Documentary Photographers Theme Camp and Gallery.  A place for models and photographers to meet and share their art.

name: Camp Playa Park
description: Enjoy a public park right on the playa, complete with grass, flowers, and friends. Swing by for one of our events or just to chill on a park bench.

name: Camp Questionmark / CAMP?
description: ‚Äú?Question Everything?‚Äù~Camp? is a community of many different people encouraging others to question. Use your questioning mind to help enhance critical thinking. Be more playful, & less passive. Through questions we will have a more intimate connection & understanding with things & each other.~???

name: Camp Rain Blo Fishy
description: Camp Rain Blo Fishy nevers says no!

name: Camp Remodeling Camp
description: Your camp or personal space need some sprucing up?  Come on by for a remodeling consultation.  Fill out the questionnaire and discuss your situation with our staff.  We do site visits too ‚Äì who knows, maybe you‚Äôll even get some actual work out of us.  Don‚Äôt keep up with the Joneses, be the Joneses!

name: Camp Shrunken Heads
description: Camp Shrunken Heads is back! We would have been last year but‚Ä¶. This year we will again be making brass, aluminum, titanium and (a few) silver b-man rings. We will also be stenciling stuff on tees, bods, etc. Everyone is welcome, except the Irish!

name: Camp Spacktackular
description: After many burns these spectacular souls have banded together to harness their inner chaos that exemplifies their version of the metropolis.  Drop in to cool out from the heat or snag a bite when we‚Äôre grillin.

name: Camp Spampirish
description: Spam-pi-rish: (noun)  1.  A camp of party activists supporting universal laws and synergism  throughout their festivities. 2.  Partiers of a diverse background, but predominantly made of Hawaiians, vampires, pirates, and the Irish; laid back camp offering beer pong (Beirut) to anyone that is interested in playing with us, a hammock dome to chill and watch the sunrise, Poi Dancing and Drum Circles, Bloody Mary Breakfast Potluck with a chance to be bitten by a Spampire, Pirate Party Spaghetti Potluck, a Beirut (Beer Pong) Tournament, and a Spampirish Bus.

name: Camp Stella
description: Camp Stella is a Burning Man theme camp of diverse queer and queer friendly folks who have agreed to experience Burning Man clean and sober for the duration of the event. Some of us are active in AA and other 12 step programs, others are not. We host 5 open AA meetings during the week.

name: camp strawberry
description: Camp strawberry is a camp that will help people grow strawberries and there will be fresh home grown strawberries that will be dipped in chocolate for burners to eat. Will have classes on growing food and more subjects.

name: Camp Unofficial
description: Camp Unofficial returns to offer succor and information. Our most sincere apologies to the entire Burning Man community for all the bad advice we gave out last year. Since then, our entire team of guides has undergone extensive SENSITIVITY training and education in CUSTOMER CARE. Let us help you to help yourself to find the bathroom, which is that way, we promise.

name: Camp Upsie Dasium
description: Are you afraid of heights?  Come find out!

name: Camp Walter
description: Walter, the worlds largest VW bus invites you to stop by Camp Walter.  When not cruising the Playa, Walter chilling next door to his friends at VW Bus Camp.

name: Camp Wannaburn
description: We‚Äôre back! Again. Camp Wannaburn style. If you want a fun atmosphere, good music, maybe a dome to dance in, or just to chill out in the shade, come check us out! Good people, good times, friendly climate, all are welcome! We party, we want to party with you, bring your good vibes and smiling faces.

name: Camp Who?Ville
description: Who are you? Who, who‚Ä¶who, WHO? Come be a shady, sexy, sly Suessophile and drink, dance, party‚Ä¶and shed your big city blues at Who?Ville! Relax under Truffula trees, keep an eye out for striped-hatted felines, and make new friends! Stars on the bellies optional. So, tell me‚Ä¶WHO are you?

name: Campo Alegre
description: Campo Alegre presents the Rumspringa Motel BRC 2010. Vacancies open at the Rumspringa Motel where the Amish party like it¬ís 1899 and no one is ever shunned.

name: Camposanto
description: Camposanto once again is coming out to the playa to share with the community music and culture from Latin America, we are an oasis of Salsa in a sea of electronica. Come and have a mojito, play some conga drums or play a beer-in-hand futbol game.

name: Can Huggers
description: Put an end to beer getting warm and hands getting cold. Join us for a cool beverage in a can hugger, also known as a beer koozie or sleeve. Enjoy your drink and play games such as poker, cards, dice and jenga! Our shade structures offer relief from the blazing afternoon sun and entertainment for everyone. Visit us Tuesday, Thursday and Friday, 2 ‚Äì 3:30pm.

name: Carbon Dioxide Camp
description: We are a bunch of punk technical artists from around the SouthWest, organized around the theme of our precious waste gas, carbon dioxide, only slightly ironically. We are collaborating individuals who individually and collectively produce works of art, do community organizing, cultural events, all with a DIY and punk socially-responsible aesthetic.

name: Cartoon Commune's Jungle Dome
description: Retreat from the hot dry playa into a lush green jungle.  Have a drink at our watering hole.  At our workshop, learn the basics of cartooning or brush up your skillz.  In the evenings, come by for a Happy Hour, or late night, warm up by the campfire.  Mornings, practice Longevity Stick with Flash.

name: Celestial Bodies
description: Celestial Bodies is a straight-friendly camp hosting a large and comfortable [underground] lounge for shade, drinks, music and entertainment. Don you favorite SuperHero playa wear and join us for an afternoon Tea Dance, Classical Chill each morning, and check out our other events and activities.

name: Census Camp
description: The Black Rock Census has been collecting information about the population of Black Rock City since 2002. Information is gathered by asking participants to fill out an anonymous paper survey. The results of the Census are displayed the following year on the Census Wagon, and in each Afterburn report.

name: Center Camp Medical Clinic
description: This is the main medical clinic for the participants of Burning Man. It is on the Esplanade, between 5:00 and 5:15.

name: Center Of Gravity
description: Center Of Gravity camp will take your mind, body, and soul to levels of bliss you never thought you could reach. Our high energy participants and creative artist create a world that is not familiar to earth. We fuel our camp with your energy and welcome any and all. Our camp is home to the Dancetronauts and a docking bay for all their art cars. We welcome all to enjoy the visual, physical, and mental stimulation that the center of gravity camp has to offer.

name: Chakra Dome
description: Chakra Dome is a home on the playa for meditation and reflection on the Chakras, the portals of energy through which our spiritual energy travels. Take a journey through the 7 Chakras to enlighten your being and make manifest the abundance of your highest spiritual self.

name: Champagne Lounge
description: Every day‚Äôs a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun! The Champagne Lounge, formerly Camp Welcome, will be quenching your champagne thirst a daily high-noon happy hour. Bring your own cup, but remember, no sex in the Champagne Lounge‚Ä¶okay, well‚Ä¶maybe.

name: Chaya Tea House
description: Authentic matcha tea & Japanese sweets prepared for you in our serene tea house. Sit, relax and enjoy an intimate break from the hustle and bustle of the city. Chat with friends, or meditate to clear your head. Designed for 4. Tea service is limited, but tea house always open. Check for sake night!

name: Cheezy Porn Camp
description: Cheezy Porn will provide a fun and interactive environment to partake in something everyone loves but won‚Äôt admit: PORN! We will be showing everything from cheesy 80‚Äôs porn to clown porn to midget porn. We will also be serving complimentary cheesy snacks and cheap wine. Cum be cheezy with us!

name: Children of Chaos
description: Chaos, joy, good conversation ‚Äì Gold Parade at our camp Thursday afternoon, assemble at 4:30 to work on costumes, parade at 5:00.  Bring your best gold finery, particularly shiny gold, but if  you don¬ít have a gold costume we will do our best to deck you out ‚Äì cocktails after the parade.

name: Chop Shop
description: Chop Shop is a small playa neighborhood Bicycle Garage that is ready to help a wide variety of playa transportation with parts, repair, and advice. While you visit our shop, please enjoy the chill spot MotionSpace, our daily Chop Shop Specials and service with a smile.

name: Chrysalis
description: The Chrysalis of the City‚Ä¶ a melting pot of where the magic, dialogue, and play occurs that evolves our consciousness into a new era of color and flight.

name: Church of The Perpetual Party
description: Confess Your Sins in A Variety of Ways in Exchange for Delicious Cold Smoothies and Hot Treats @ our New Diner, ‚ÄòThe Cafe Confessional‚Äô. Kick Back or Come Dance Beneath our Shade Structures with our Crazy Congregation.

name: Circle Academy
description: Circle Academy is dedicated to sustainable community through creative education. On the playa we will offer workshops, provide workshop space to others, have a library, host a wedding chapel and evening events, and more!

name: Circle Rules Football Camp
description: Circle Rules Football: fun to watch, more fun to play! (isn‚Äôt everything?) Be a part of the circular sensation that‚Äôs sweeping the nation! Sports invention workshops, stunning visuals, performances and more. Free Official Circle Rules Ball for qualifying participants.

name: Cirque du Cliche
description: Cirque du Cliche returns for another year of live music and stilting madness‚Ä¶

name: City Repair Camp
description: City Repair Camp is inspired by a Portland organized action group that turns excess urban spaces into beautiful community places.  Come by our camp for fun workshops on how to create similar projects in your own city as well as tea time, circus fun, and music jams.  Free box.

name: Cloud City
description: Cloud City is an aerial space filled with shining silver balloons. Come during the day to enjoy the blissful light energy of the Cloud Chamber. At night, overlook the playa using the Cloud Eye video installation or just chill by our burn barrel and check out the fire and lights in the clouds.

name: Clown Town
description: Clown Town, come on down, we‚Äôre the scariest clowns that were ever around. We‚Äôll have carnival games with plenty of prizes to transform you into a burning man terror, there‚Äôs even a couple of bar nights. We‚Äôre new this year, so come out and play with us in the dark metropolis. It‚Äôll just be a ball.

name: Club Verboten
description: Our revolutionary and institutional camp returns to offer our popular mix of retro avant garde‚Äô dance paries in 2010. Hosted in the semi-luxurious Tent of the People we look forward to serving the BRC Citizen in unique fashion.

name: Cock 'n Waffle
description: If you wanted to sum it up, visiting our camp is like walking into a Waffle House/Comedy Club/Game Show/Dance Party/Casino/Native American Sweat, but different.

name: Colonel'sFrothyFrozenFortuneFloats
description: ‚ÄúI see you‚Ä¶in a vast desert‚Ä¶parched‚Ä¶and wandering in a place unlike any other‚Ä¶ What is it you desire? Something cold‚Ä¶frozen‚Ä¶frothy‚Ä¶‚Äù That‚Äôs right, come by the Colonel¬ís Frothy Frozen Fortune Floats camp for fortunes and ROOTBEER FLOATS. We know you‚Äôre on your way‚Ä¶

name: COM Association of Social Services
description: Visit the City of Metropolis Association of Social Services to get food stamps, ‚Äúfood‚Äù assistance, and ‚Äúshowers.‚Äù  We can help you with all of your ‚Äúneedy‚Äù needs!

name: Comfort & Joy
description: Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a queer community oasis offering daily events including yoga classes, discussion groups, skill building workshops and outrageous performances every night.

name: Contradance Community Camp
description: Contradance all levels every night. Live music ‚Äì didj, electric fiddle; looped/trad‚Äônal/celtic/fusion/techno. Fastpaced but easy to learn. Caller instructs but room for dancers to improvise. 1/2 the moves w/ your partner, 1/2 w/ everyone else. Tribal. Zen is flow, synchrony, bonding (not footwork).

name: Contraptionists
description: The Contraptionists welcome you to step out of the sun and cool off in our breeze catching shade contraption and enjoy a Snowcone from 1 to 3 in the afternoon Monday through Saturday. See the Love refinery, Vegas lounge or maybe a twist in our naked misted twister game, No Spectators, adults only

name: Cool Aid Oasis
description: We bring back our signature drink, KOOL AID, along with other frozen treats.  We are here to hydrate you, refresh you, hug you!!!!  Come relax with us, listen to our chilled out beats, enjoy a sno-cone while escaping the heat.

name: Cool Town
description: We provide a large fully-misted shade area and seating whenever it‚Äôs hot.  Join us for a cool drink, conversation and activities.

name: Cosmic Collidescope
description: What fun can be had with bending and reflecting light!  Step into the ‚Äúinfinity room‚Äù and see a thousand reflections of yourself fading off into the horizon.  Your costume looks great!  Spin the Cosmic Collidescope and warp your own light or burst into a million fractals in the humaleidoscope!

name: Cosmic Giggle
description: Cosmic Giggle is home to the ‚ÄúGet Your Shit Together Here‚Äù and ‚ÄúWork Your Shit‚Äù gardens, providing a workout circle for crazy people plus daily offerings for physical pre-burn enhancements, a Muscle Tea workout observation porch, and MOOP Collector Distribution and Decoration Station.

name: Cosmic Recess
description: Cosmic Recess is a playground with a space theme.  We believe interactivity, creativity and play are neccesary components for happiness and joy!  All of our playground elements are original and homemade (most with recycled/reused materials).

name: Cosmic Toy Camp
description: Come Play at the Cosmic Toy Camp and relax under the giant cap of the Fungus Humongous, which has come to earth and grown into a 15‚Ä≤ tall cosmic glowing mushroom. We‚Äôve got mini RC Helicopters and planes for you to fly as well as other toys to inspire your imagination.

name: Cosmotropolis
description: Enter Cosmotropolis and step back to the relaxing days of the martini lunch. Hear the sounds of Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin as we sip our cold martini and watch the days go by. Join us for our special lunch cocktail hour, bring your own cup, Wednesday 11-1. Don‚Äôt be square, swing by, give us a twirl

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: Find your soulmate! Our staff of trained professionals provide comprehensive interviews to help you find the very best person on the playa to hang out with! Customers may enjoy complimentary drinks, random acts of spontaneous tomfoolery, and soul connections ‚Äì all at warehouse prices!

name: Couch Burners
description: Couch Burners are the cross section of an international project of hospitality exchange and those that practice and promote this on the Playa.  Visiting our camp could start the process of a home-hosted Burner experience in a complete different country!

name: Covered-In-Bees!
description: Step into the Bee-Hive and allow the dripping, humming melodies of bees transport you as you lounge and smoke a hookah (or 3). Drink deeply of honey-flavored sacraments and bask with us in the hedonistic glory of the bee! Dance, shimmy and show off your fire, and you may be crowned as Queen BEE!

name: Crackwhore Camp
description: Crackwhore Camp ‚Äì where the good are spanked with pieces of Giant Jenga then soaked in a fine microbrew.

name: Cul-de-Sac
description: Feeling homesick? Not for this home, but the OTHER one ‚Äì in the OTHER world? If so, then Camp Cul-de-Sac is the place to be. We are the remedy to your longing for the comforts and familiarity of the suburbs ‚Ä¶ just a few radial arms away. Don‚Äôt worry. We won‚Äôt tell.

name: Cult of Koitus
description: Cult Of Koitus is all about the King! King Koitus is for one reason only to quench thirst! If your thirsts need quenching stop by and see the King.

name: Damn Fucking Texans
description: DFT is back in Black Rock and says Howdy! We‚Äôre in Gigsville again & come packing our signature Southern Hospitality and COLD BEER! Texans, Non-Texans, ex-pats, Texans that never lived here yet, those who ain‚Äôt been but like beer and pretty girls & everyone else‚Ä¶Come on by. The pilloasis awaits‚Ä¶.

name: Dark Sparkle
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive, the unexplainable quality that pulls you to the dark side. We bring interactive workshops and performances that challenge citizens to find mystery and beauty in themselves and others.

name: Darwin Fish Tank
description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank! When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and beat the heat with our misting system for a genuine adventure in the belly of the beast: Atlantis, an underwater metropolis. Come for the flowing beats, stay and chill amongst the waves with some liquid joy.

name: Death Guild/Thunderdome
description: Burning Man‚Äôs other side of the tracks since 1997.

name: DeBocceri
description: Do you have fun with balls? Wanna play with ours? Join our crew at DeBocceri, International Bocce Ball Camp, for Bocce Ball Tournament and Happy Hour!

name: Decadent Oasis
description: Every big city needs a park¬Ö.Escape from the Metropolis to an Oasis of light and sound! A glowing grove of palm trees, shade sails, and ever-changing activities¬ómusic, games, acro-yoga, hoops, and performances on our stage. We invite you to come play, dance, and perform‚Ä¶.

name: Deep Heaven
description: Deep Heaven: Heart of the Metropolis ‚Äì We share our hearts with the Playa through a commitment to authenticity and honesty. Look for the heart beacon by night and the rotating heart mirror by day; seek out our hug zones, find solace and laughter in our sanctuary and attend a playshop in our dome.

name: Deep Playa Rover Camp
description: Deep Playa Rover is a desert airline intending to colonize the deep playa, beyond the trash fence. We will provide electric transportation to and from the outer reaches of the play at sunrise and sunset with an electric-vehicle-powered trailer ‚Äì or, in the absence of cash, we will just talk about it.

name: DeMentha
description: Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You‚Äôll find great tunes from our DJ line-up, lovingly prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you‚Äôve got the perfect recipe for a good time. 1-5pm daily. Dark Wednesday.

name: Department of Mutant Vehicles (DMV

description: Disgraceful behavior is required.  Bad singing, a well honed ‚Äì ‚ÄúElvis loves you darlin‚Äù, a fine tuned liver. A good joke. A reasonable good sense of balance; and balls that blink. name: Don'tYouKnowWhoIAm?!
description: Don‚ÄôtYouKnowWhoIAm?! kind of speaks for itself.

name: DPW Ghetto
description: Home of Black Rock City‚Äôs Department of Public Works

name: Dr. Le Tawdry's Panacea
description: We have potions to cure all diseases and ills.  Come by to try Dr. Le Tawdry‚Äôs concoctions and leave with a light heart.

description: Dub Scouts Troop 808, Black Rock City Council. On my honor I will dub my best To do my durty for wob and crunktry and to crank the glitch slop; To help people stay blinky at all times; To keep properly hydrated, perpetually bassed, and morally confused.

description: The Duckpond, like Cheers is a place where everyone knows your name and all drinks are served with a smile. When you get too hot (and you will) you can take a trip down the 150ft slip n slide. When you get too cold we can warm you up with a Playa Special.

Find Eden and find invigorating APPLE vinegar foot baths, organic harvested APPLES from family owned orchards, and even a resident massage therapist! Come indulge!

name: Eggchtropolis Bar
description: Any Metropolis needs a local gathering spot‚Ä¶ Eggchtropolis Bar is just that and much more.   Come Drink, Sing, Dance, Enjoy spontaneous interaction in our splendid environment, our gift to you‚Ä¶

name: El Dorado
description: El Dorado is a unique, fun and nurturing space designed to enable the (re)discovery of inner beauty‚Ä¶ Please join us in the ‚ÄúGoldDust Lounge‚Äù to ring in the evening with specialty drinks, fabulous entertainment and a wonderful place to connect.

name: Electric Ladyland
description: A cooperative of fire lovers, electronics junkies, funky dance music freaks, photographers, welders, fabricators, musicians, and artists who love to blow off giant fireballs and keep you dancing all night. name: Emergency Services Station 9
description: The Emergency Services 9:00 Medical Station is open 24 hours a day.

name: Enlightenedville
description: contains Cubatron Camp, Camp Ma‚Äôam, Camp Save The Man, and Peace Bowl Cafe.

name: Expansion Mansion
description: Welcome to Expansion Mansion!! Please enjoy our pictures!

name: Fairy Tale Theater

name: Gravitypoint

This Black Rock Outpost is a field training exercise & scouts will be taking surface readings to prepare for the mothership.

name: Heavy Equipment
description: Heavy Equipment Camp and DPW equipment yard.

name: honorarium art piece
description: Malvoye the Mentalist: A fully automated antique fortune telling booth, shares versions and visions of the future. Nightly, Malvoye‚Äôs powers of mentalism are summoned to give you your own very unique and astonishingly accurate fortune.                     Malvoye knows all, Malvoye sees all.

name: Humboldt Beauty Bar
description: Back by popular demand and by appointment only. Get glamourized on the Playa at the one and only full service salon from humboldt county. If you are lucky enough to get pencilled into our appointment book, that is‚Ä¶.

name: Hung Far Low
description: Let‚Äôs talk and have a drink and we‚Äôll show you why having a Hexayurt is the way to go. Our camp has different yurt designs small and large, Hung Far Low Yurt Camp!

name: Hushville
description: Hushville, an aural oasis in the chaotic cacophony, is open to anyone who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1) No generators; 2) no amplified sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. Hushville is host to large camps, solo campers, theme/non-theme camps with residents from all over the planet.

name: Hut of the GlamTech Warrior
description: Where The Eye and friends live and entertain.

name: I'm OK, You're OK Corral
description: The Corral will be celebrating it‚Äôs 10th year on the playa ‚Äì and we want you to help us celebrate in style!  Massive carved wood saloon bar, saloon hussies, cowboys and cowgirls, camp jail and daily playa virgin roundup ‚Äì complete with OK Corral branding station!  Join us!

name: IdeaDome
description: A group dedicated to the creative spirit. A place to share, collaborate, create, think and have fun doing it together.

name: Identi-T Farm
description: Identi-T Farm, a unique & unexpected ¬ìCity Concierge¬î service, to welcome & inspire people taking part in the Burning Man experience.  We will provide our visitors with new identities/‚Äùplaya names‚Äù, refreshing ice-t, tarot card readings, a pampering spa experience, yoga, meditation & other goodies.

name: Illumintation Village
description: At 16 years old Illumination Village is one of the oldest village on the playa! We are an active, driven community of dedicated artists, technologists and fans of fire. We stoke the flames, mixing fire and steel, keeping your body warm at night, and your eyes twinkling with the glow of combustion.

name: Image Node
description: This year Image Node is bringing you Grand Mal and the Node Transit Authority.  Please stand clear of the closing doors!

name: Incendiary Intent
description: Incendiary Intent ‚Äì Making life‚Äôs bad decisions for you.

name: Insex
description: Camp Insex is interested in all things of an arthropod nature ‚Äì mostly spiders and insects ‚Äì and their unique mating behaviors.  Stop be the camp and talk about your favorite or most feared creepy crawly, ask any burning question, pose in the giant amber chunk as if a Burner from millions of years ago became entrapped, show us your arthropod tattoo, and learn about the beauty of insect sex via our dioramas and informed camp entomologist/arachnologist.   This year, let¬ís talk about the oldest Metropolis¬í the world has ever known: Ants & Termites.

name: Intention Dimension
description: Intention Dimension is a space that encourages living intentionally in all dimensions of life through example, workshops (See WWW Guide), and an inviting atmosphere.  Come join us in our sanctuary focused on sustainability, happy healthy life styles, healing and expansion, and creative expression.

name: Interaction Cafe
description: At the Interaction Cafe we do not serve food or drinks ¬ñ we serve interactions. Perhaps you‚Äôd like to start off with a casual conversation for an appetizer, engage in an interactive game for an entree and end with a song for dessert while you drink in the moment.

name: Interstellar Mediums
description: Escape the bustling Metropolis in the Peacock Lounge shade hammock & swings. Play with a rocket nose-cone (it‚Äôs been to space) with spaced scienctists as your Mediums to the Universe. Enjoy mid-day Sangria at Dr.Stu & Nurse Jane‚Äôs Mammogram stand. Tiktaalik the 3-legged art-car brings music & light.

name: Iron Rose
description: Iron Rose is Bluegrass, Hula, Whipcrackin‚Äô and Bingo in a Big Red Pill.  With Fire.

name: ISH
description: Camp ISH of Flipside fame brings its special brand of alien creature comforts and games to the playa.  Come enjoy bass shaking tranquiloungers, over a thousand square feet of blackout shade, and find out if you are genetically compatible with the space travelers from Planet ISH.

name: James Brown Camp
description: A wonderful desert oasis of funk and friends.  A place to get up with the get down and shake your groove thang!

name: Jigglin' Weenie Camp
description: Join the Jigglin‚Äô Weenie Camp for a Weenie Roast on Tuesday & Thursday. There will be food, fun & gaity to be had by all!

name: Journeys
description: Harmony and Unity with yourself and the spiritual world are available here by receiving a spiritual reading, dream interpretion, energy flow restoration and chakra healings, and massage by appointment. Why limit yourself to just the spiritual, cool off in the afternoons with a SNOW CONE and fun?

name: JubJub's Plastic Circus
description: Welcome to MonkeyTown where we proudly serve funny hard-to-get drinks, uneasy rest, strange music, weird plays, loud noises, oh-so-friendly grief, bruises, nausea, vertigo i.e. Monkey Business!!!   maybe poo too

name: L'Homme Flambe
description: The finest French restaurant in BRC, renowned for its obsequious service and utter contempt for its patrons. L‚ÄôHomme Flambe serves hors d‚Äôoeuvres and canapes (those are French words ‚Äì you may Google them) with great aplomb and hauteur (that is a French word ‚Äì look it up if you have to).

name: LAFer Camp
description: 8 years strong, and always morphing, we are the infamous LAFer Camp. We are always open for new friends to participate in our camp activities, come by for a medallion, a cold beverage (please bring your own cup), or our come-as-you-are Paint Your Booty party on Wednesday.

name: Lair of The Lurking
description: Mingle with the most Vivacious Villains! Come cause some mischief, graffiti the lair, participate in the ultimate Good vs. Evil challenge, take a night ride in wicked style, or find your soul lost in the Labyrinth!

name: Lamplighters
description: Come be a part of the longest running art project on the playa. Come down to center camp at 5pm to light the city.

name: Lavender Lounge
description: A place to relax and chill from the heat and dust with beds, lavender eye pillows, cooling lavender mist and vibrating head massages. All are welcome to join us.

name: Lazy Lizard Lemonade Lounge
description: The Lazy Lizard Lemonade Lounge invites all shade loving lizards to pull up a rock from 12-4 for fresh home made lemonade. Sit a spell and enjoy the the afternoon in a lazy and laid back way. Come back after dark for your own transient art made with playa dust!

name: Le KafŒπ
description: Le KafŒπ welcomes you for a cup of organic & fair trade coffee or tea, iced or hot, with an Irish flair or French style. Menu extravaganzas will be offered daily, check every morning. Come relax in a cozy shaded area with comfy futons and most of your favorite board games! Open 11am to 1pm daily.

name: Lenny Camp
description: Come visit the now legendary Pope Lenny O‚Äô The Playa and his loyal minions as they wreak their very special brand of havoc from the friendly confines of Lenny Camp. We‚Äôre the secret substance that holds our companion Camps all together‚Ä¶..come see how and enjoy the live acoustic music jams!

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: Home of the Playa Mediation Booth and the original Leopard Lounge! Need a help mediating a problem with a neighbor, partner or friend? Come talk to our professional mediators.

name: LEtsGO Lounge
description: A place to relive (or continue) your childhood with your favorite plastic building blocks. Pounds and pounds of Lego to keep yourself entertained for hours.

name: Lick and Suck
description: Camp Lick and Suck is our favorite Burning Flip Side Camp.  From 2005 to 2008 it was a meaty meal camp, in 2010 we have morphed into a diverse collection of unique burner types.  This year we bring an icon of our Dallas Skyline, The Lighted Orbital Escape, to act as a way point on the Desert Horizon.

name: Liminal Labs
description: Share your experiences with the Psycho-Geographic Society Interactive Mapping Project. Play with our surrealist map making & viewing tools online and on-playa that can be enjoyed & added to by BRC explorers¬óno matter what your space/time coordinates. Pre-burn; twitter to #neoTAZ or use our website.

name: Lip Service
description: Lip Service: Burn the Man not your lips!

name: Liquid Latex Lounge
description: The lounge will again be painting your body. We will teach you how to paint a ‚Äòfriend‚Äô, or we will talk you into something interesting. Just drop by from mid morning on. Come join our drum circle at dusk as we relax after a hard day of brush work.

name: Lollipop Guild
description: Lollipop Guild is an inclusive group of gay friends who embrace all humanity.  We are gathered to express ourselves as individuals and members of the Metropolis community.  In the spirit of love and celebration, we will perform non-binding, diverse and creative Playa weddings for all.

name: Lost City presents Cirque du SoGay
description: As the sun sets behind our Mayan pyramid, the statues of the lost gods begin to glow, as we invoke the Nine Lords of The Night.  Our aerial performers take to the sky while flame artists, jugglers, tumblers, and clowns set up a raucous noise.

name: Love Potion Camp
description: Love Potion Camp welcomes you to a chill space full of art, creativity, whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes and Luurve. This is a non-sexual space but cuddling and BIG hugs are welcomed and encouraged.

name: Love Puddle Playground
description: Recess!  It‚Äôs the playground you‚Äôve always wanted, complete with a bar.  The Love Puddle Punch is flowing along with love and hugs.  Careful though, you might end up in detention or being spanked with the love paddle.  Games include four square, tether ball and dildo jousting.  ‚ÄúThe Bar Is Open!‚Äù

name: Ludo O'Dillo's Publick House
description: Imagine walking along a road and suddenly coming upon a traditional Irish pub; step through the red door and belly up to the bar for a pint, a shot of whiskey or an Irish coffee. Play a game of darts or checkers, or enjoy a Celtic cinematic classic (and not so classic!) on our projection screen.

name: Luscious Lies
description: A camp for the individualist, the Global Nomad, the one who knows not who he/she is. While having experienced life to the fullest, the multiplicity of interests and the layers of knowledge gained have only served to confuse you. Come to our camp to discover your Essence- buried under Fictions is YOU!

name: Machine Control Compound
description: Stop thinking for yourself and let machines do it for you!  We are conducting erotic mind control experiments on male and female subjects‚Äìpossibly you.

name: Mai Tai Dye
description: Sip a Mai Tai while you tie dye! Bright colors in spray bottles ‚Äì get crazy and add some color to your underwear. But the fun doesn¬ít stop there‚Ä¶body art! hula hoops! stop by for a creation of your imagination, stay for the after party! DJs, visuals, glow and fireworks glasses (Dome party time TBA)

name: Major Space Commanding Yogis
description: Commanding inner and outer space, elucidating the pearls of wisdom from masters Sri K. Pattabhi Jois and Yoda and occasionally serving coffee and bringing a nice yoga space to the playa. Come join us for evening conference, take a ride on our super tech house-y rickshaw and maybe a yoga class.

name: Mal-Mart Mega Store
description: Mal-Mart is an exploration into America‚Äôs consumer driven society where the shopping mall reigns supreme. Mal-Mart will deconstruct the shopping experience by offering Burning Man residents their first multi-level shopping mall where nothing is for sale and ideas are more valuable than ‚Äúvaluables.

name: Mansonian Inst. of Urban Studies
description: The Mansonian Institute of Urban Studies presents a study on the infrastructure of Black Rock City. Why is it laid out in a circle? When the Port-o-Lets are emptied, where does it go? Find the answers to these questions and much more through our interactive displays.

name: Marching Band Camp
description: This is the place for HOT MARCHING BAND ACTION!

name: Martini Village
description: Join Martini Village and enjoy frosty refreshments, relaxation and, entertainment!  Stop by for a Martini Lunch, interactive games of Monopolis, a relaxing pit-stop at blue agave, some real F.U.N or the night time thrilling ElectriCITY with interactive parade of lights! Explore the Martini Wonderland.

name: MASH 4207th
description: MASH 4207th is a theme camp celebrating the Korean War era television show MASH. We are dedicated to creating a camp with the infrastructure and social organization that reflects the character of MASH.

name: Masquerade
description: Because everyone in Metropolis is entitled to a secret identity‚Ä¶Stop by and decorate a mask, or create your own one of a kind masterpiece. Then, join us for the Masquerade Ball, Thursday at 8 P.M. until we run out of age appropriate libations (or somebody makes a beer run).

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: Math Camp, A Safe Place for Mathematics. A small, social camp, we offer a place to drink and derive! Home of the Fabulous Electric Cupcakes. Purveyors of crunchy snacks & The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the Playa. Don‚Äôt miss this year‚Äôs DorkBot lectures series!

name: McMassage Camp
description: For the weary dusted traveler, no Metropolis would be complete without big golden arches shining up high in the desert sky. Please come seek comfort & joy inside our McOasis! We‚Äôre ready to serve any Metrosexual who desires a fresh espresso, or even our Quarter-Pressure Massage. Fries with that baby?

name: Meadful Things
description: Although mead was the first alcohol produced by every civilization it is no longer a common beverage.  The goal of Meadful Things is to share traditional mead with those who have never tried it and educate those interested in it.

name: Meanderthals
description: Come run the Metropstacle Course; Battle your way through 8 different obstacles, collecting your disguise to become the SuperMeanderMan (phone booth included). Also back again this year is everyone‚Äô favorite past time, bludgeoning your opponent with a giant turkey leg in THE TURKEY CLUB JOUST.

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is the Press Room on the playa, welcoming and helping to acculturate the registered members of the media who come to cover the event.

name: Metro Mart
description: Your source for ‚Äúplaya necessities‚Äù. Were there for you when you‚Äôve forgotten a little of your ‚Äúradical self reliance‚Äù at home.

name: Metro Tea Station
description: Join the San Diego Art Divas at the Metro Tea Station for a more sophisticated side of Burning Man ‚Äî chill out with a cool, refreshing cup of tea, listen to some soft music and relax before venturing out into the wilds of the Playa.

name: Metropolis Museum of Art
description: The worlds masterpieces redone and miniaturized with a twist that reflects the members of our camp.(self portraits, painting/sculpture) A fine collection of pre-historic to contemporary art that has been altered to express what the original artist really wanted to express but was too afraid to do.

name: Miajuana
description: Miajuana is a dream of a Mexican outpost on the border of your mind. Come test your boundaries at Spanko Pelligroso‚Äôs Wrestling Ring, pray with the Sisters of the Nasty Habits, straddle Juana the Vibrating Burro, and tipple in the Titty Tequila Tent. Who wants to run for the border? Miajuana!

name: Midnight Poutine
description: Bonsoir nos amis! Come and sample Quebec‚Äôs favourite late night snack at Midnight Poutine. Learn the awesome power of french fries, cheese curds and hot gravy. Embrace the joie de vivre of our bilingual Canadian camp. A bientot! LŒ≤che pas la patate!

name: Midnight Ridazz
description: Roll into the Midnight Ridazz camp for bike blessings from our Ordained Ministers, maintain your motive self sufficiency with mentored DIY bicycle repair, join us on organized cycle tours and stick around for some sexy, sexy bike talk. It‚Äôs a Metropolis of Bicycle Babylon here!

name: MidNite Popcorn Palace
description: Popcorn to the People!!! The Popcorn Palace is back this year with our mobile popcorn kitchen & plush theme camp. Look for our armored car that will pull the Goddess Of Popcorn and her precious cargo through the streets of Black Rock City. As usual, strict dental hygiene will be enforced‚Ä¶

name: MidTown
description: Not downtown, not surbubia‚Ä¶. MidTown. Bringing small town charm to Black Rock City. MidTown includes members that originate from the towns of Auburn, Colfax and Weimar in Northern California and a few other random people from small towns in Japan and Kentucky.

name: Mike's Garage and Karaoke
description: Bring your mechanical or electrical problems to Mike‚Äôs Garage. I will gladly drill, grind, glue, weld, solder or whatever it takes. All I ask is your favorite karaoke rendition.

name: Mind Shaft Society
description: The Mind Shaft Society is a group of artistic scientists who collaborate on a theme and present the findings at Burning Man. On sabbatical for 2010, the Mind Shaft Society will sponsor the Metropolis Bureau of Artistic Development where Black Rock Citizens can apply for Creative License.

name: Minitropolis
description: Both the support camp for the Megatropolis project, & the wildly interactive offering of a large group of burners from both Reno/Sparks & all over the world. Drop by for laughs & a drink in The Rising Arms pub, many exciting activities, or friendly refuge & mist under our large shade structures!

name: Mission Country Club
description: San Francisco‚Äôs Mission district outpost on the playa. Pretentious coffees served daily! Find our bike-mobile CURRY KART for fresh authentic Mission street-food. Come by Thursday at 4:20 for our 6th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party: dance to Cumbia/Salsa/Merengue while devouring 50 gallons of Sangria.

name: Mobtropolis
description: A flash-mob of buildings will battle a vicious group of disasters to show the citizens of BRC that justice can come in unexpected shapes & sizes (and that its really fun to battle while dressed up in fun costumes) and then gift lemonade to said thirsty citizens from our Golden Showers lemonade stand!

name: Mohammeds Mini Martini and Erotica
description: When the sun reaches its zenith and is beating down on the citizens of Black Rock City, head over to the coolest Bedouin Palace on the playa and relax with an ice cold martini while lounging on pillows and poufs. Peruse our book of true erotic stories and if the spirit moves you write one yourself.

name: MOIST
description: Get plastered at MOIST!

name: Moloch
description: ¬ìCamp Moloch¬î is named after the monstrous deity of Fritz Lang¬ís ‚ÄúMetropolis‚Äù to whom hapless workers are sacrificed in the interest of the upper-world regime. The camp will be set up as a miniature version of the modern city.

name: Monkey D's - spank the monkey
description: What metropolis is complete without your favorite familiar drive thru?  Swing by Monkey D‚Äôs ‚Äì over one billion spanked, to order one of our specialty drinks like the Big Monk or the McMuff, dine in or drive thru!

name: MonkeyLove
description: A jungle oasis with hammocks, mist, monkey chants and all the monkey love you can handle!

name: Moonbow Camp
description: When the full Moon shines upon Yosemite falls, the Moonbow there, creates a special gathering place of natural reflection that represents America‚Äôs great parks. We‚Äôre campers and activists that will bring artistic events, crystal singing bowls, and Gay pride parade for todays ‚ÄúGays in the city‚Äù.

name: Moonrock
description: Moonrock brings you a public park on the playa with arborealis: an interactive, reactive, glowing monkey habitat for your climbing delight. Relax with fireflies in our treeopolis, then look out over the modern city from the canopy. Welcome to the Jungle, we‚Äôve got fun and games.

name: More Carrot
description: More Carrot is here to help ensure that the citizens of Black Rock City get their vegetables. We are the hosts of the Black Rock Farmer¬ís Market and the people behind several roving events including the Countless Carrots March (can¬ít let the bunnies have all the fun!).

name: Mountain Mayhem Camp
description: High altitude love from the mountains of Colorado!  Walk through our aspen and pine tree snow covered forest to the base of ‚ÄúMt. Tropolis.‚Äù Come sledding, enjoy cold/refreshing drinks and dance yo ass off!

name: Mr. Fixit
description: Mr. Fixit  We offer minor repairs to most things electrical and mechanical. Including but not limited to Espresso Machines, Generators, and EL Wire.

name: Musement Heights
description: Musement Heights is dedicated to evoking wonder, playfulness, celebration & community. Join us for happy-hour theme parties & stilt parades at UPtown Lounge, relax on our shady Stoop. Warm your bones at Fire Dept; Feast your eyes, minds? At MUSE, a stunning pagoda that will enchant and inspire you.

name: Mustache Camp
description: Mustache camp is a celebration of the ultimate facial adornment.  Tools abound to fashion or fake your nasal underbrethren.  From the glowing mustache visible across playa in the center of our camp to the nightly mustache competitions, you will immerse yourself in that most glorious triumph of hair.

name: Mutant Audio Outpost
description: A haven for audio experimentation and those seeking out non-traditional and unorthodox music and sound. Stop by and play our experimental instruments, listen to unusual musical performances, and take part in sound creation workshops.

name: Mutinous Picnic
description: We have been called to weird for Burning Man. Enough said.

name: Mystikal Mysfits Waldorf Mystoria
description: The Mystikal Mysfits Waldorf Mystoria is a full service hotel with a premiere lounge that is a common meeting place for those wishing to get in out of the hussle and bustle of the truly metropolitan Black Rock City.

name: Mystopia
description: Camp Mystopia offers many mysts: the Magical Mystery Vans and Mobile Mystery Science Theater will rove the playa sharing gifts, popcorn and film, while our camp itself will host a Mystery Fruit Stand, a Cooling Myst Tent, and of course the 2010 Mystery Masqued Ball.  Come visit our MYSTerious utOPIA!

name: MyTropolis
description: Camp Mytropolis is an interactive lounge featuring Music, Dance and a Workshop to support the MyTropolis Art Installation. Participants can find out about how they can create and install their own buildings to add to the interactive sculpture garden. Donate Your Building at mytropolisproject.com

name: N-Gon Tomorrow 2010
description: Here today, N-Gon Tomorrow! Join us for a round of golf and a drink at the tenth hole, then decorate our canvas with your art!

name: naughty karoke
description: Come by and join us for Naughty, Sexy, Freakin‚Äô Karoke FUN and Sensual Burning Man Cocktails‚Ä¶.you‚Äôll love what you see ‚Äì be sure to ask for Heather‚Ä¶our ‚ÄúSuper Naughty Karoke STAR‚Äù !

name: Nectar Village
description: Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need¬Ö to survive, refuel, and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and you¬íll find the nectar you seek for any of them, in the camps at our oasis. Offerings continuously from 8am to 10pm.

name: Neon Monkey
description: Where the concrete jungle of metropolis meets the prismatic nature of the hominid family, Neon Monkey is formed, an evolutionary experiment of buffoonery and rapturous indulgence. Let your animal side (de)evolve with us!

name: New Jersey
description: HEY go F%?& yourself!  Jersey‚Äôs known for it‚Äôs unique style of hospitality, and we welcome all travelers. Stop by, hang out in our pyramids, tell us a story ‚Äì just don‚Äôt ask us what exit we‚Äôre from. Fuggeddaboutit!

name: New Reno
description: New Reno is the finest 1920‚Äôs gangster town, this side of the apocalypse. Bring your tuxedo.

name: Nexus
description: Nexus is an experimental community, within an experimental city. We live, sleep, work, eat, drink and party like rockstars together. Epic music every night, and friendly sarcastic bartenders keep you coming back for more all week long.

name: Nice Nice Camp
description: Daily musical jam sessions around specially crafted interactive 8 foot long chimes (tubular bells) & adjoining swing set. Investigate our new neon & concrete triptych in which glowing plasma flows in response to the human touch. Contemplate our murals and answer timeless questions about Metropolis.

name: Nimbus Construction
description: Massive gravity, scale, sound and height draws you to multistory monolith to play with interactive lighting, bring the skyline of Black Rock City to life and observe and experience the metropolis from the clouds. Come pay tribute to the primal need to rise above and create at the monument.

name: Ninja Burger
description: Enjoy the best ancient warrior-made fast food on the playa! Our burgers are vegetarian friendly, and available with Original Sauce, as well as Mild and Hot! Come get a burger while fighting for your life against trained assassins! Ninja Burger: Delivery in 30 minutes or less or we commit seppuku!

name: No Influence
description: We‚Äôre here to enjoy the wonders of Burning Man without the influence of drugs and booze, and to help others do the same.  No hangovers, no 12 steps, no attitude‚Ä¶ not under the influence.

name: NORMALVILLE
description: No glow sticks, furry boots, or trance music required.  NORMALVILLE is a place where you can just kick back, relax, and be your normal self!

name: Northwest Mist
description: Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat, step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshening. We are also the home of the ghost of The Lady Washington residing in the Redirection Connection Village.

name: Nose Fish
description: Camp Nose Fish returns in 2010 to support the Ein Hammer project and to present our ‚ÄúUn Hammer Coffee Shop,‚Äù serving coffee and cookies every morning to help the citizens of our metropolis get ‚ÄúUn Hammered.‚Äù  Also returning in 2010 is our MEZ Interactive Video Screen!

name: Nun'ya Pink Pirate Lounge
description: Sometimes in a thriving metropolis you need to kick back with some cool folks, grab a drink and dance to some great tunes. The Nun‚Äôya Pink Playa Lounge will strive to provide a friendly, welcoming atmosphere where the stress of the big city can fade away‚Ä¶ Welcome home!

name: NYC Container Camp
description: NYC Container Camp is the New York container filled with all the love, joy, art and creativity shipped from the other side of the country! Come get your goods and sit awhile for our evening drinks while putting together your bikes and art and connect with other New Yorkers!

name: NYrvana Village
description: Honoring Metropolis with New York attitude.  Home of Kostume Kult, RoofTop camp, Animus, Horny Camp, PRED and the True Mirror Palace, come by for some Brooklyn edge, Kostume giveaway Dome, Lady Liberty Lounge, roof-top Water Tower, Bad Advice and the infamous ‚ÄúHorned Ball‚Äù on Wednesday.

name: Oasis 47
description: We are the small craft bazaar in the Black Rock Metropolis. Liberate your inner artist amidst our comfortable tribe of desert nomads.  Join us to practice fire spinning, embellish bronze pendants, learn the secrets of EL Wire or take our Crab Taxi to far away destinations. Join us. We serve you.

name: Ocean's Serene
description: Retreat from the heat and the dust inside Ocean‚Äôs Serene Luxury Spa @ Stardust Lounge Casino. Pamper your skin with a rejuvenating treatment, beautify your body with a unique temporary tattoo, or simply hang out and relax with our lovely mermaids.

name: Octopia
description: The Order of Disgruntled Octopi returns with the expanded return of our neighborhood nexus and stage for public revelry. This year, our compound will include three domes, containing a bar, a dance area, and a hammock lounge. We have booze-and if you‚Äôre lucky, bacon. We do weddings‚Ä¶ and funerals.

name: Oden's Eye Apple Cider
description: From the Odenwald to the wild woods of Mendocino, Oden‚Äôs Eye is open for cider distribution once again.  Come, drink, be merry: we party beneath the shadow of the Wolf once more!!!

name: Off-Center Camp by Kamp Kabaam
description: Off-Center Camp is a community center for untalented people, unbalanced athletes and burners with no sense of orientation, located just ¬ìoff-center.¬î We cordially invite you to bring in your bike, bring your own cup and shut the fuck up!

name: ONiON
description: Black Rock City‚Äôs cigar bar.  Check out our smoking hot butts!

name: OPHU & Cooperative Knowledgebase
description: The Office of Playa Handle Underwriters & Cooperative Knowledgebase or OPHUCK is the official agency of the Department of Name Reassignment. Our agents are here to help the uninitiated assimilate, by replacing boring, hard to pronounce ‚Äòdefault names‚Äô with suitable, easy to say ‚ÄòPlaya Names.‚Äô

name: Opposable Thumbs
description: Come on over to our swamp coolered lounge and stage and help us Colorado hillbillies raise pandemonium on the playa.  Lap down some libations while makin‚Äô an ass of yourself in public and you‚Äôll be sure to fit in.

name: Opulent Temple
description: Opulent Temple is a sound and art installation here to provide community bonding though big beats, sound and fire.  Sacred Dance to world class music is the intention.  A party with a purpose.

name: Organized Confusion
description: At Night we will have a dance club and a bar. An 11‚Ä≤-0 rear projection video screen. DJ Willey Blaze and friends. Every day we will hold a Rock and Wood carving workshop.  We will provide the neccesary tools and supplies.  We also have our very own Wizzard who will be serving Tinksters (potions).

name: Orgribbar
description: Quests, tesla coils and a bar, oh my! Nothing says play fun like EPIC QUESTS! We give out adventure quests that you can turn in for fabulous prizes. Chill out with fellow adventurers at the castle bar! And at night enjoy the spectacle of live music and two giant tesla coils!

name: Oroboros
description: OROBOROS is a diverse art collective from New York City. We offer B-Boy/Breakdance classes, Kundalini Yoga, Meditation, Stretching sessions.

name: Otter ReEvolution #9
description: Otter ReEvolution #9 is an oasis of love and conscious celebration.  This is the 15th year in a row in which we, the Otter Clan, bring our love, laughter and fancy pants dancing to Burning Man.  Viva La ReEvolution!

name: Outpost 23
description: Outpost 23 ‚Äì we strive reach new and obtuse ways to affect your sanity. Whether it be through music or just being generally weird; we‚Äôre here to serve you. But were not sure what to do after that‚Ä¶expect 80‚Äôs music, megaphones and bubbles‚Ä¶

name: Paddy Mirage

description: Polaris Tribe is a collective of fire//glow//gogo performers seeking extensualism in the technique of visual dance. name: Remedial Kindergarten Camp
description: Black Rock City‚Äôs School for Wayward Girls and Boys. If you never learned to keep your hands to yourself or mind your manners, come play with us! name: Revofuckinlution

Erotic Fetish Wear from Rubber Inner Tubes (See What When Where) & Women¬ís Only Liquid Latex Body Painting (Fri. 11:00am ¬ñ 3:40pm.
