description: Wake Your Ass Up! Come on by at the crack of Playa dawn (10am-11:30am) to get your daily spanking and hot coffee. Yes, from Tuesday through Friday your friendly semi-corporate pawns will be serving up piping hot solar-brewed coffee and brisk spankings! Bring your own cup.

name: Science Boudoir Cabaret
description: Exploring the intertwined relationships that exist between Science and Art, the Science Boudoir Cabaret melds dance, the culinary, aural explorations, science, steel and good times into an intoxicating brew for passers-by.

name: Science of Churchology
description: Come visit our chapel, funeral home, and graveyard. The preachers of the gospel of the Science of Churchology will perform exorcisms, funerals, weddings, and play Russian Roulette (with a toy gun). We have thumbderdome and karaoke too.

name: Scotch & Hop
description: Too long has ‚Äúhop‚Äù been in front of ‚Äúscotch‚Äù! Come and Enjoy some ‚ÄúScotch‚Äù with your hop!  A playground for adults featuring, what else but hopscotch, and maybe a couple of other games. A  relatively simple child‚Äôs game kicked up a notch! Prizes include, Scotch!

name: Second Star to the Right
description: We have created this camp out of the dreams that we have had and this camp intern is here not only to encourage others to fufill their dreams but to show by example that all dreams are possible.

name: Serenity Giant Game Camp
description: Giant Game Camp is back this year and in a BIG way. Hang out and enjoy the games you played as a kid. Picture a giant size Connect four or a Checker Board you have to walk on and move your pieces. No more searching for people who aren¬ít embarrassed to play kids games.  Check calendar for other events.

name: Serotonin Rejuvenation Camp (SRC)
description: Sometimes you need a shady place to collect yourself after a night of sensory overload. That¬ís where our highly trained serotonin rejuvenation advisors come in. We will review each case and prescribe a treatment of pillows, faux fur, bacon and orange juice followed by natural serotonin supplements.

name: Sex Filth Avenue Boutique
description: SEX FILTH AVENUE Boutique 24/7 self service. Donations desperately needed. Recycle your old naughty sexy playa wear. Bring a big bag of costumes. Cleanup & Restocking daily 9:30AM volunteers clean up and put out new costumes. They get first pick of the new costumes. Don‚Äôt miss out. 3:15 on ‚ÄúA‚Äù

name: Sexagon City
description: Stop by our unique carpeted and shaded sexagonal home where you may relax on the couch with the natives, Hoopdance in a lighted carpeted streetside hoop-a-gon, or ascend 20 ft. to our crow‚Äôs nest to see the BRC panorama. Enjoy the affectionaltely depraved, interactive Barbie Love Zone if you dare.

name: Shady Asylum
description: Please come enjoy our grass ‚Äì we will have a large, live lawn underneath a well-shaded canopy.

name: Shady Waffle
description: Burning Man can be pretty intense: the people, the music, the motion, the heat‚Ä¶ our goal is to provide an escape from all of that. A shady, cozy nook on the playa where you can take a yoga class, meditate, or enjoy a peaceful breakfast.

name: Shadyvil
description: Welcome to Shadyvil. A place that some call home; others shake their heads with wonder.  Nevertheless, Shadyvil is high class livin¬í and down home comfy with a discerning palate for beer, bourbon and bacon.  We have Shade. Swarms. Nurses. Yogis. Meat Lovin¬í Vegetarians & an Urban Safari Club.

name: Shamandome Camp
description: ShamanDome Join us in a journey to find your power animal; to recover that lost soul you left with your ex: to clear the door to your great cosmic dance: and we protect you from most everything:::: but yourself:  if you want transformation from your mountain, come to Shamandome.

name: SHIFT
description: SHIFT is a large, friendly camp serving the international community at Burning Man.  We believe the mind and body are One with the Metropolis. This year we present two attractions: ‚ÄúEddie‚Äôs Downtown Bar‚Äù and the ‚ÄúThe Uptown Church of Dreams‚Äù   Yoga, cocktails, speakers, dancers and dreamers.

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: A vintage teak sailboat beached upon the rocks of a forbidden isle. Join the castaways for afternoon grog at their exotic tiki bar of handmade idols, gods, and flaming totems. Beware of cannibals!

name: SHoP
description: Home of Sparky the Fire Truck and his crew.

name: Siberian Electric Company
description: New for 2010, the siberian electric company is bringing power to the people. Someone always has to live next to the power plant so why not a soviet era nuclear reactor, come get contaminated with us.

name: Silicon Village
description: Have a drink at the Hair of the Dog bar and music stage, chill at Semuta Lounge dome, watch Tesla coil demos, refresh in the misting booth, windsurf, refill your bike tires, watch a Merkin fashion show and SO much more. We love to meet new people and are looking forward to seeing YOU on the Playa!

name: Skid Row
description: Skid Row: Home to transients, alcoholics and addicts.  Come join us at 2PM Tue-Fri at the Gin and Juice Bar. Have some beers, listen to classic 90s rap, get a tattoo at our seedy henna tattoo parlor and make your mark on our graffiti wall.  For the hungry, Genesis Mission Soup Kitchen opens at 6:30.

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
description: Regroup and Relax at our teahouse with Skinny and friends; serving tea 24/7. We offer a refuge from the unse, unse, unse, by providing a piano and space for performance, music, conversation, funk, art, and copeira.  We are reliquarians.

name: Slutgarden
description: Remember those guys who treated you like shit just because you wanted their crappy vodka drink? Fuck those guys. Slutgarden will dress you, drink you and dance you into perfection.

name: Snow Koan Solar
description: Snow Koan Solar is camp dedicated to providing clean power and good times.  We operate a solar-based power grid for the entire Nectar Village.  We host a recharging station where Burners can come to recharge electrical devices. We also serve snow cones daily and host entertainment in our dome.

name: Snowflake Village
description: We compress 8 interactive camps into one small space. See a movie, get body painted, do Speed Dating, take a vacation, rant on a mic, have a conversation, get rubbed with sunscreen, write in a book, try a vegemite sandwich‚Äî At Snowflake!

name: sober Free society
description: Impromptu sober Free meetings available when people are present.  Get proper sober Free therapy from the sober Free society.  New this year, sober Free faux tattooing!

name: Soft Long Pants
description: Soft Long Pants Camp is a glamorous look at what is vogue and sheik in the utter confines of pure relaxation.  We Offer a tender way of saying, ‚Äòlets kick back in style‚Äô, while getting to know our city friends in a long soft pant pillow dome, while being served wonderful, healthy elixers of Chai tea.

name: Sore Nipple Camp
description: Come by and spin the Wheel of Enjoyment (maybe), have a drink and play some games.  Ladies  see how many C.D‚Äôs you can stack on your nipples (record 15), ride the Sybian, have a jello shot or get blasted with the Long Island ice tea squirt guns.  Come see why we are the World Famous Sore Nipple Camp!

name: Soul Vacation & Jah Jah Day Spa
description: Soul Vacation and Jah Jah Day spa is your funked up reggae and roots rock all-day stop for an infused foot wash, various body work and tropical fruit drinks.  Want a chilled out rub down with good conversation and smooth grooves; we‚Äôre here.  We‚Äôll bring the JUICE and you bring the smiles!

name: Space Bass
description: Space Bass is a camp within Disorient that brings the sounds of solar wind and interstellar journeys.  We invite you to visit our lunar party and have a Mint Julep.

name: Space Cats!
description: Space Cats & The Roarax Rounge Present BOBO JENKITOWN‚ÄôS All-Day Karaoke Lounge at the World Famous Hammock Hangout featuring The Roar Shack and Tiny Tea Party.

name: Space Cowboys
description: Wrangling the cosmos for well over a decade, the Space Cowboys are proud to provide the hitching post for the playa‚Äôs finest dancers, discos, djs, dreamers, and sugar daddys. but please don‚Äôt follow us, we‚Äôre only following the Mog‚Ä¶

name: Space Lounge
description: Space Loung is home of the Space Wench and crew.

name: Space Nutz
description: You‚Äôve bent time and space before‚Ä¶ right?!?!  Float on in and dock your booty to our dance floor.  We‚Äôre gonna open up a black hole portal and transcend to another dimension. Take your protein pills and put your helmet on!

name: Space Virgins
description: No Fear, No Shame, No Guilt, No Judgement. The Space Virgins are all about love, interactive art, and providing a comforting oasis in a sea of stimulation.

name: Spanky's Wine Bar
description: The camp that takes a humorous approach to wine, bondage and bdsm

name: Spin Art Camp + Del Fuego Art Wall
description: Spin Art Camp + Del Fuego Art Wall- Remember Spin Art? We built a 4 foot diameter version! Come and make your own one-of-a-kind art work on a core board that we supply, or feel free to take off your shirt and make an awesome Burning Man Souvenir! This year we are also Hosting the Del Fuego Art Wall!

name: Spirit Dream Interpretation CafŒπ
description: Perhaps it‚Äôs your thirst, the smell of espresso and mocha, or the drum circle that draws you in, but as you enter the atmosphere you realize that there‚Äôs more here than you first thought. Make your way to the encounter tent to unlock the secrets of your spirit and transform your journey.

name: Spock Mountain Research Labs
description: SMRL returns for it‚Äôs 13th straight year on-playa as world leaders in beverage science and leisure technology.  We drink lots of hyperwhiskey, write the Spock Science Monitor (BRC‚Äôs newspaper of record), hit people on the head with boards, and eat sandwiches.  Bring us sandwiches.

name: Squid Row
description: The denizens of the deep present Squid Row¬ís Atlantis, the aquatic civilization where new secrets will be uncovered and other things lost. Visit the 3D submarine, send a message-in-a-bottle, or spin the Wheel of Deadly Sins, savor our aquatic cocktails at the Atlantic Shipwreck lounge & bar.

name: Stalker Camp
description: Ever dreamed of having your very own stalker?  Come to stalker camp and sign up for some consensual stalking on the playa.

name: Stardust Lounge
description: When the Stardust Casino was reduced to a pile of ashes, dust, and memories, witnesses swore they saw a glittering swirl of purple smoke drifting Northwest. Pawn your jewelry and double down at the Stardust Lounge, where dirty martinis and dirtier cocktail waitresses rekindle the spirit of old Vegas.

name: Stars by the Ton
description: Come live the experience of the sky!  We transform a familiar playa dome into a planetarium where we can share the rhythm and symmetry of the heavens.

name: Steam Bath Project
description: The Steam Bath Project offers Black Rock City a public, wood-fired steam bath in which to cleanse and relax. The hot moist air contrasts incredibly with the dry heat of the playa. Constructed as a geodesic dome, the space is open to all!

name: Still Stings
description: Come take a nap in our hammocks, sit and chat, make a jellyfish hat or just float along with the jellyfish swarm for a spell. Still Stings is a little piece of quiet on the playa. (Also celebrating random acts of quesadillas üòÄ .)

name: Stilts by the Ton
description: We are living large and living tall!  Our bar gives away delightful and intoxicating beverages to anyone tall enough to reach the counter.  (Our counter is 8 feet high.)

name: Storybooks in Alleyways
description: How do creative and collective spaces persistently arise in the Metropolis? Follow our alleyways to the library where you‚Äôll find a wonderland of storybooks and a quiet haven for reflection, creation and sharing. And a very special wall of dream jars, waiting to be created and shared‚Ä¶

name: Sukkat Shalom
description: The mission of Sukkat Shalom is to ‚Äúrestore faith to those who sleep in the dust.‚Äù  For two years, Sukkat Shalom has gathered disparate sparks of the Divine contained in all persons, forming a space for interconnection and exchange between all religions and cultures present on the Playa.

name: Summer Camp
description: Welcome to summer camp paradise! It‚Äôs time to revisit our youths for swim tests, arts & crafts, tug-o-wars, story time and scavenger hunts! Whether you loved or hated summer camp as a kid, we promise the playa version will be awesome, and a great escape from the busy Metropolis!

name: SurlyCamp
description: SurlyCamp ‚Äì Home to the SurlyBird, the one and only bio-diesel art car with beats so good, they break your face. SurlyCamp is still home to a bunch of assholes, great beats, going big and bacon. Sorry about your face, whore!

name: Suspended Animation
description: Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture!

name: SwagMart
description: SwagMart is an Oasis of creativity located in the heart of Black Rock City. We provide Shade $ Music with FREE unusual materials to create SWAG necklaces,earrings,and noteworthy embellishments for your Playa Wear. Join us for a bit of shade, fun conversation and meet Burners from all over the Planet

name: Sweaty Betty's Misting Parlor &Spa
description: Rejuvenate, invigorate and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as Sweaty Betty and the MonSalon combine forces for a unique spa experience. Our misting tunnel and hair washing will leave you refreshed and once again ready to plunder the playa. Open during the peak heat of day.

name: Swing City
description: Direct from the original Muscle Beach in Santa Monica California, Swing City is our home away from home.  Complete with a full traveling ring set and rigging for aerial silks, chinese pole, slacklines, hooping, poi, acro, and other gymnastic beach fun.

name: Syncytium Maze
description: The Syncytium Maze:  Behold Syncytium! Seek dreams and dark secrets within. Will you find a way out?

name: Syzygryd Base Camp
description: Syzygryd Base Camp is a support camp for the on-playa construction, operation, & maintenance of Syzygryd. Our camp brings together an incredibly diverse, creative, & supportive group of individuals. Come by to learn how sculpture participants make music & how we created flame effects/fire tornadoes.

name: Tabula Rasa
description: Tabula Rasa and the Playaterium emerge once again from the dust, bringing jewelry making and more.  Sit a spell at one of the comfiest and harmonious spots in Metropolis, as you make a gift, take a gift and leave a gift at our small slice of the bigger picture.

name: Tahoe
description: Tahoe Village welcomes Burners from the Tahoe Region!

name: Tahopia
description: North Lake Tahoe Burners.  Think outside the cube!

name: Tangoed up in Blues
description: Discover what it‚Äôs like to hold a partner in your arms and move to the music.  Tango.  Blues Dance.  Join us in re-popularizing partner dance in America.    We‚Äôll have the music going around the clock for you to come explore these two intimate dances with a friend, lover, or even a stranger.

name: taosCamp
description: A camp within a camp within the city..a small sanctuary ..a home away from home

name: Tarwater
description: The Metropolisis has been covered by the sands of time.  Tarwater‚Äôs Rooftop Plaza survives.  Featuring: Starlight Bowl-a-Rama, the Emerald City Croquet court, and the From Above You, It Devours Ring Toss Game, unscheduled acoustic music, and MORE!

name: Tasty Con Sol
description: A marriage of Sol System, Conexus, Tasty, Airpusher & Howarya, TASTY CON SOL will offer daily drink & food DJ happy hours, the sky-stretching Yantra spire, a swamp-cooled dome, the Airpusher sound bus, a mid-week nighttime party & Eyes on Art, illuminating playa art for evening viewing.

name: Temple of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
description: The Temple of the Flying Spaghetti Monster A refuge for all Pastafarians Yearning for a brief touch of His Noodly Appendage. Nightly sacraments and events will fill the hearts minds and mouths of devotees with praise and piratical yelling, and dust! Come on by and see the Temple!

name: Temple Town
description: Temple Town is the official headquarters of the 2010 Temple of Flux. Within our little slice of the metropolis of Black Rock City lies the heart of operations for the Temple. Temple Town will be the central gathering place for all Temple Crew members and home to some of the crew.

name: Tennis Camp
description: Martina fell in love with Steffi. Chris changed her name from Evert to Lloyd. Bjorn‚Äôs beard got caught in the net. Boris was always at an advantage. And the Queen thought John terribly rude. The glory days ‚Äì of proper tennis whites, wooden rackets, and Pimm‚Äôs in the Royal Enclosure ‚Äì return!

name: Tentura Camp
description: Tenture and Antitenture ¬ó two opposite parts of Kin-Dza-Dza Universe. Some planets and galaxies exist in Tenture and some (including Earth) in Antitenture.

name: Terminal City
description: Terminal City is a village of theme camps including The Booby Bar, APOKILIPTIKA, Playawaste Raiders, Sex Filth Avenue Boutique, M.A.S.H. 4207th and Herring Camp.  Join us for many fun games and interactive features and nightly theme nights at the Booby Bar. Terminal City ‚Äì No Gas, No Food, No Mercy.

name: That Bloody Camp
description: That Bloody Camp returns with its haven of morning-after repose. We will cut through the dust of the playa and the previous night‚Äôs excesses with spicy bloody marys and even spicier servers.  And of course we will give you space to relax, connect and maybe even make a new friend.

name: The Automatic Subconscious
description: A Boston-based Theme Camp with a storied history of bringing our own special blend of fun from the east coast. Our second-generation ellipsoidal dome will be a center of activities 24-hours a day.

name: The Avant Yard
description: The kids of the city bring you a place to explore the limits of your imagination, collaborate with others, create, and play.  Through performance, workshops, parties, games, and general shenanigans we ask, ¬ìWhat role can the arts play in our ongoing evolution?¬î  Come by and play!

name: The Booby Bar w/i Terminal city V.
description: The B(o)(o)by Bar, a social gathering place for new and returning burners  alike, consists of two well-tanned domes that house the best damned bar on the  playa. The B(o)(o)by Bar is a theatrically interactive place have a drink,  meet new friends, laugh, and enjoy each day of life in BRC.

name: The Bouncy Bouncy Club.
description: The BBC will be small this year.  Small, but beautiful.  There will be a bouncy castle with silly music running 24/7.  The week will reach it‚Äôs climax with the fabulous ‚ÄúWilson Phillips Pancake Breakfast‚Äù on Sunday morning.

name: The BRBC 99.1 FM
description: The BRBC is a 100% solar powered radio station bringing you music, information, witty banter, not so witty banter, and YOUR chance to be ON THE AIR! Stop by the RadioShaque(tm) in Fandango Village (look for the tall radio tower and BRBC flag) and keep your dials tuned to 99.1 FM all week!

name: The Creatures Metropolis
description: Scaled down version of LAS VEGAS STRIP where Godzilla attacks Metropolis    This all will be for the creation of short movies participants will shoot, edit and preview within the week. All props, wardrobe, etc on hand. Just need Dir/Actors/etc, The Crystal Method will play live Fri and burn stage.

name: The Crown Collective
description: The home-port of The Lady Sassafras (art-steamship) and the Crown Collective.

name: The Daily Playa
description: The Daily Playa: all the news we feel like printing lands in the Black Rock City Metropolis this year.  We welcome all playa urchins for newspaper delivery duties on Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday.  Also a note from our reporter-at-large Mr. C. Kent: ‚ÄúFar from home.  Lonely.  Any of my countryfolk in Metropolis?‚Äù

name: The DETH End
description: Miss the Deep End?  We are The DETH End.

name: The Dickstracted Camp
description: The Dickstracted Camp is and adult-gay oriented camp emphasized on bringing exhibitionism and voyeurism to the playa.  Come and take a ‚Äúcollective‚Äù shower with us or let yourself be ‚Äúscrubbed‚Äù in our 18‚Ä≤ tall ‚Äúvoyeurs-shower-tower‚Äù all this while enjoying a nice drink in our ‚Äúhappy hour showers‚Äù.

name: The Dirty 530
description: Strategik will satisfy your craving for some filthy bass at The Dirty 530.

name: The Dump
description: Our trash is truly treasure!! Swing dancers, horn players, guitarists, drummers, accordionists, and vintage decorations create a ‚Äòrecycling‚Äô theme camp unlike any other. name: The Errordrome
description: The Errordrome is the mooring station, service depot, and passenger terminal for the Hindenburk, a 40-foot long, heavier-than-air dirigible. One of this year‚Äôs Honorarium art projects, the Hindenburk will sail the playa at an altitude of several inches, recreating the heroic early days of aviation.

name: The Filthy Gentleman's Club
description: We may be Filthy, but we are also Gentle‚Ä¶Come play reverse strip poker and enjoy a cigar and cognac with us, or just cool your souls (soles) in our fountain and relax a bit with like minded folks. Our aim is to provide rejuvination between festivities, and ALL are welcome.

name: The G-Spot
description: The G-Spot is a often hard to find and always pleasurable location in the warm (sometimes frigid) wonderful lower region of the Black Rock Desert, deep inside the fantasy zone known as Black Rock City where, you may discover an incredible welcoming environment.‚ÄùThe G-Spot if You Can‚Äôt Find Us ‚Ä¶You Are Not Coming‚Äù!

name: The Gender Blender
description: The Gender Blender is a safe haven for those bending and blending gender, a place to come and explore for those who have always wanted to mix up their gender but have never before, and a spot for those who are curious about gender play and how gender impacts and affects our lives. And smoothies!

name: The Green Hour
description: Fresh from the Black Rock desert circa 1910, THE GREEN HOUR will serve ice-cold beverages from our ghostly, self-propelled and wildly unpredictable steam engine to Black Rock denizens at random locations during the glorious final hour before sunset. Absinthia Ex Machina

name: The Gypsy Monkeys
description: In every corner of the globe, especially places that call themselves a permanent metropolis, there is a very mobile class between baron and nomad, the gypsy; between saints and demons, the monkey. We are as permanent as need be, but always free to follow whatever muse amuses the most.

name: The Hive

name: The Institute
description: Ah, the Institute‚Ä¶ of higher learning? higher earning? higher yearning? Perhaps. Or perhaps just a center for the study of the wide-spread, grievous affliction of bicoastal disorder. We‚Äôll never tell. We merely guarantee round-the-clock experiments with the edges of art, technology, and movement.

name: The Itty Bitty Titty Twister
description: The Itty Bitty Titty Twister seeks to reincarnate the essence of the Titty Twister from From Dusk Til Dawn. We probably won‚Äôt have to slay an army of vampires, but you‚Äôll probably want to come by to make sure. Anything can happen, and that something will is CERTAIN.

name: The Janky Barge Collective
description: The Janky Barge is a 40 foot long bus with a mobile sound system that is crewed by the Fringe Arts Collective. We are a collection of DJs, producers, dancers, artists, and creative enthusiasts. We aim to provide some of the best music and the cleanest sound on the playa.

name: The Lost Boys
description: Come dance and play with The Lost Boys! Out of Neverland and back on the Playa for the 4th year in a row, we‚Äôre bringing you music, dancing, theme art, and every morning join us for last year‚Äôs  big hit, the Naked Bacon Cook-off! We provide the bacon, you provide the naked.

name: The Lost Penguin Cafe
description: What could be more lost in the desert than a Penguin? You aren‚Äôt lost, you‚Äôve found just the place you are looking for! Drop in and enjoy our shade, couches, wine, chocolate, snowcones, friendly people and good times. Night and day there is always something or someone interesting at The Lost Penguin!

name: The Mine
description: Art support camp for ‚ÄúTowering Inferno‚Äù an installation by Anton Viditz-Ward.

name: The Ministry of Douchebaggery
description: For the last 6 years our camp has been comprised of THE PURGATORY CRUISER, NEUROWEAPON, and DEAD COW art vehicles. We house 20+ DJs as well, and half a dozen satellite personal art cars. The Cruiser and Neuroweapon are large scale audio stages.

name: The Mudskipper's Urban Decay Cafe
description: The Urban Decay Cafe is emerging from the jungle-infested ruins of Black Rock City to bring its inhabitants refreshing primordial sludge floats.

name: The Nome
description: This year, the Nome supports the Burning Man organization for meetings, receptions and meals. If you are a friend of The Nome please drop by and say hello.  (Feel free to edit this or even kill it. Do what works for you. We don‚Äôt need publicity this year.)

name: The Oontz Pouch
description: An oasis of oontz providing rolling brownouts mixed with pouch hits straight to the dome. Come oontz us!

name: The OROgenous Zone
description: Orogeny and erogenous are the sacrifice & the pleasure. Scheduled periodic two-phase rituals: voodoo-like ceremony to purge the evil from people being tormented by the demons in their mind, reike message for curing. Goldschlager liqueur with gold flakes (oro=gold) the cleansing medicinal fluid.

name: The Phage
description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth‚Äôs living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. Phage scientists will evolve your minds with workshops, dancing, and interactive art.

name: The Pink Spot
description: The Pink Spot is a Utah-based burning man theme camp of friends, a.k.a ‚Äúthe bunnies‚Äù.  Please come by any time for drinks, great music, big hugs and comfy plushness.  If you see The Big Bunny on the playa, hop aboard!

name: The Playa Pen
description: Hula hoops, poi, and all sorts of fun toys we are willing to share.  Bring your cup for a refreshing boba tea and come check out how we bounce at the Playa Pen.

name: The Poisoned Palace
description: Come be a rock star at the Palace Karaoke Bar.  We‚Äôve got a professional sound system, stage lights, and over 2500 songs in our book. So what‚Äôs it gonna be? The Stones or The Smiths? Madonna or Metallica? Neil Young or Neil Diamond? Van Morrison or Van Halen? Doesn‚Äôt matter, as long as you have fun!

name: The SEED
description: The Seed of Infinite Love The Seed brings daily doses of love‚Ä¶exactly how you have always wanted it. Stop by and get diagnosed our licensed Love dispensary, drop off that baggage you ‚Äòve been carrying around, enjoy a cold Kombucha and then relax & expand in one of our daily workshops,

name: The Shallow End
description: The Shallow End is back.  This year we are hosting two parties in the Martini Village. The Molopolis Martini Party features two small performance stages ‚ÄúCommunity Chests‚Äù & ‚ÄúTake A Chance‚Äù. ElectriCity, a party that invites participants to show up with lighted costumes and we will get you lit!

name: The Sonoran Sunrise Bar
description: Need a place to unwind after a long night on the Playa? Come rejuvenate your tired ass and watch the playa sunrise with a tequila cocktail at The Sonoran Sunrise Bar between the ass-crack of dawn and whenever we kick you out! All drummers welcome!!

name: The Spoon Return Return Center
description: A center for returning spoons!

name: The Swedish Embassy
description: This is the Swedish embassy. Curious about what‚Äôs going on on the other side of The Atlantic? Get over here to find out! This year The Swedish Embassy is also hosting The Grand Flat Piano.

name: THE WANDERER'S CAMP

name: Things That Swing
description: You‚Äôre a thing, get over here and swing. We‚Äôve got swing sets for dueling, hammocks to drool in, and pendular art you can fool around with. We‚Äôre also hosting yoga classes, chanting sessions, and a giant game of twister. If you can swing it, bring it!

name: ThunderBubble Circus
description: A free-expression zone of higher mind magic, healing, dance, music and creativity, where your spiritual genius will be nurtured in a loving, supportive and wildly fun environment. Shamans, psychics, mystics, artists and healers will help you to integrate the transformation that Burning Man catalyzes.

name: TikiFuckos
description: We are a bunch of Fkos with a Tiki theme but nobody really cares how it all came about. And we still don¬ít know where the drunk Mexicans came from. As previous years we are still your destination for debauchery, shenanigans, DJ music, yoga in the mornings, fire play and 40‚Äôchill dome and fire cannon.

name: Time for Tea
description: Afternoon tea hosted by a group of eccentric English ladies and gents. All served with lashings of surreal mismatch mayhem juxtaposed with traditional english ceremony. Come join in the tea party extravaganza and find a slice of quintessential british charisma in the outback of the American desert.

name: Time of Your Life!
description: Escape the chaos of the city at Time of Your Life Community Park. Playground and sand pit.  44‚Ä≤ Dome.  Lush grass and hammocks. Jam sessions, puppet shows, plays, beat box, arts and craft, yoga classes. Swamp machine and misting system.  Water Bar and Margarita Party.  DJ‚Äôs day and night. Come play!
hometown: Costa Rica, Canada, Tahoe, Cabo, N/A

name: Tissue and a Plan
description: Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don‚Äôt know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. ‚ÄòCause all you really need is a tissue and a plan‚Ä¶

name: Titicaca
description: Imagine camping on the desolate shores of a lake high in the Andes mountains.  Smell the campfire with foil wrapped potatoes and steaks grilling‚Ä¶mmmmm‚Ä¶and butter!

name: ToneAge
description: ¬ìToneAge is where weary souls find restoration in lucid beats, chill domes, radical veggieclusiveness and costumed cocktails (aye aye!): come participate with us as we create our vision of a Utopian suburb in the Burning Metropolis.¬î

name: Tons O' Camps
description: Our group represents a huge array of talents and passions, the one thing we have in common is our desire to be larger than life and to share our big love with the whole playa.

name: Transmorphagon
description: Transmorphagon always has as many sides as it has.  A Place for Live Music, Performance, and Home of the Post Apocaplyptic Art & Chill Space, PANDORA‚Ä¶.

name: Transparent Metropolis
description: We are evolving towards intraspecies omniscience.  Come get a step closer‚Ä¶

name: Tree Ring Circus
description: Find shelter from the desert sun in this pocket of cool northwestern trees. Follow a path to our Hookah dome and rest in the shade on a nest of pure pillow perfection. Relax in shady hammocks under the tent, while our bar serves up fresh drinks. Defy gravity on our climbing wall and chill to down-tempo beats during the day, then shake your booty to nighttime funk.

name: Trench Town
description: We are from outer space. We have come, from the Future, to bring Black Rock City‚Äôs Metropolitan heart beat into balance and equilibrium through galactic harmony. Dedicated to celebrating a wider spectrum of musical genres. Come to enjoy live musical interaction, celebration and aural stimulation.

name: Tribe: City Lights
description: Tribe.   We are hosting the City Lights project and the world naked bike ride.

name: TROPICAL METROPOLIS TWISTER
description: TROPICAL METROPOLIS TWISTER- Giant TWISTER game with a tropical theme. Get lei‚Äôd, play giant Twister, and  take your photos at the Island Native sign.

name: True Mirror Palace
description: The True Mirror Palace returns to the Playa ready to blow your mind with mirrors that reflect you truly ‚Äì no reversed images. All the mirrors in all the Metropolises in all the world are nothing like the True Mirror.  Dare to compare! PS‚Ä¶look for the sparkle in your eyes!

name: Tsunami Camp
description: Tsunami Camp returns to Black Rock Metropolis offering you Playa Fashion Makeovers, Radical Body Painting, a Creative Word Smithing Booth, a Performance Space, a Bar, and warm welcomes.  Spanking cards received at the Greeters Station may be redeemed at our camp.

name: Twin Freaks
description: Hidden in the bustling Black Rock City metropolis is our own little piece of heaven: Welcome to Twin Freaks! Home of the Miss Twin Freaks beauty pageant, the mysterious Talking Log, the Black Lodge freakout, the playa‚Äôs best cherry pie, and a damn fine cup of coffee! The owls are not what they seem.

name: Two Lanterns Camp
description: Best weddings on playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (incl. rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments, Annoying Phone Booth, Crazy Traffic Light, Dreams Visions Hallucinations Fantasies and Joslyn¬ís Little House of Oral Delights. Trip on our camp el-wire art: Ripple

name: Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves
description: O illustrious merchants of the flesh and pillagers of the wealth of man, our glorious master, Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just, he who rules with the wisdom of Soloman and the might of Saladin, commands your presence at his slave auctions and for his workshops.

name: Ultra Stunt Danger Academy
description: The Ultra Stunt Danger Academy is all about distinction.  We search for the distinction between rational fear and irrational fear, and try to push the boundaries between.  We examine the distinction between authority and compliance, and have been known to disturb the social fabric along these seams.  We‚Äôre naughty like that.

name: Unintelligent Design Society
description: The Unintelligent Design Society dedicated to demystifying the Wonder Bread of life, stirring the Primordial Soup and exposing the Warholian building blocks of culture in their most unintelligent form. As Andy would say ‚ÄúArt is what you can get away with‚Äù.

name: Universal Babel Service
description: Dictate a letter to one of our Babelers and watch as your words get typed onto the page with a classic typewriter! We¬íll deliver your letter via messenger throughout Black Rock City or post them to the default world using beautiful vintage stamps.

name: Unlikely Books & Brews
description: The Unlikely Books & Brews Camp will feature live poetry and literary reads in a variety of styles, best enjoyed with our homebrewed beers. We will have printing, binding, and reproductive equipment on-hand for on-the-spot book creation and printing and spontaneous scrapbooking.

name: Urban Cats
description: After last year¬ís Evolution, some of the members from Camp Natural Selection have evolved into a gang of sophisticated and urban adapted cats. We have stretching place, matching game, and a daily sunset social hours with teas and cookies. Even Animal Control members are welcome!

name: Urban Jungle SPA
description: The Urban Jungle SPA is ready to pamper your mind, body and spirit. We are a group of medical doctors, alternative healers, and seekers of all sorts coming together to create new approaches to health and wellbeing.  Our camp offers daily yoga and alternative healing activities.

name: Urban Pirate Varriety Show
description: The Urban Pirate Variety show, the only stage in black rock city so radically participatory that the audience regularly mutiny‚Äôs the preformers. Graciously we invite our audience into our parlor of hospitality for a urbane high society dinner party conversation.

name: USHA
description: Offering Salutations to the goddess USHA. A new dawn, the awakening.

name: VAMP CAMP
description: Stop by the Vamp Camp ‚Äì Day or night. During the day you can cool down on the Mr. Mister stage and clean up with BRC‚Äôs only fully functional bidet. During the night stop by the Vamp Camp bar and enjoy some vamp juice and sit next to the beautiful Vamp culdrun to warm up.

name: VegCamp
description: VegCamp invites people to consider the effects of their actions on animals, the environment & humanity.  This year we‚Äôre planning more vegan food giveaways as well as our popular Ask-a-Vegan booth, videos, lectures, discussions, cooking demos, photo exhibits, & literature.

name: Ventura Oasis
description: A resting place for the weary‚Ä¶  a peaceful relaxed camp  far from the bustle of the playa offering shade water and friendship.

name: Verandah-licious
description: We are the latest incarnation of The Porch and Meta-Porch from years past, offering respite from the sun, a small stage for random acts of performance, a bocce ball court, and groovy beats for your soul.

name: Vertical Camp
description: Experience the best of residential living on the playa. We live an efficient, urban lifestyle ‚Äì exemplifying highest and best use practices of infill development along the transportation corridor. Join our high-rise revolution, and come appreciate the views from atop the tower.

name: Videogasm
description: Nightly video projection on our 3 big screens. Host of the BRC 48 Hour Film Project. Body painting, airbrushing and spray paint art every afternoon in our dome. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday Night. Contact us if you have an original video you‚Äôd like to show. Located in Snowflake Village.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Camp
description: We provide delicious Vietnamese Iced Coffee in a festive setting to the denizens of Black Rock City.

name: Villains & Vixens
description: Surrounded by the Metropolis, an oppidan oasis exists. Nestled amongst the hustle and bustle ¬ñ a place to retreat, dance, play, seek shade, seek warmth, paint and be painted.  Home of the Rock Star Pump Stop and the Temple of Possibility, this oasis is just right.

name: Vinland
description: In 1003, Leif Erikson founded Vinland, the first European settlement in North America.  Though it no longer stands, its descendants live on.  Help us celebrate his legacy every night with chilled homebrewed mead, warm fire, cordial liqueurs, and tasty Scandinavian treats in an oontz-oontz-free zone.

name: Volcano Worshippers
description: Come and share a kind day with the Volcano Worshippers!

name: Voodoo Bistro
description: The Voodoo Bistro will feature offerings to the spirits and explore the powerful force that is voodoo.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Punk Rock is the soup du joir at this camp ladies and gentlemen. And what better to compliment your heaping plate of rock and roll than a skateboard miniramp? A bar specializing in whiskey will be provided to grease the wheels of your skateboard. Truly, an oasis in a desert of electronic torture.

name: Vulcantown (Formerly OMCC)
description: Vulcantown is dedicated to the Study, Teaching, Practice, and Performance of Juggling Based artforms, including Firespinning, Contact Juggling, and any other form of object manipulation.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: Enter VW Bustropolis and experience unique ways of metro living. Relax in our Urban Jungle Day Spa, get a new/old look at Bus Camp‚Äôs Grateful Dyed tie dye party, hitch a ride on BusZilla 2 our  gas/electric articulating VW Bus people mover, Hula Hoop while enjoying fine brews at camp‚Äôs Hoopa Dome!

name: W*H*O*R*E's Oral Moistening Clinic
description: World Health Organization‚Äôs Response to Epidemics team of clinicians will soothe the rancid pie-holes of Black Rock City. Epidemiological statistics show a sharp rise of ‚ÄúPlaya-Mouth‚Äù occurs every August in the Black Rock Desert, brought on by too much alcohol, energy drinks, dust and dirty oral sex.

name: WANT IT!
description: WANT IT! understands more than anything what it is to desire. We are a camp that celebrates wanting and the importance of desire as a driving force in life. Push it further! Want it harder! WANT IT!

name: Warp Zone
description: Doot doot doot do-doot doot! Hop to The Warp Zone ‚Äî your premier destination for castles, gold coins, stars, hammer-throwing turtles, mystery boxes, and surly princesses. Don‚Äôt forget your plunger!

name: We're Ped-I-Culous
description: We‚Äôre Ped-I-Culous is a place to come and rest your weary, dry and cracked playa feet. We clean off the dust, do the best in reflexology on your paws, then apply lotion and clean socks so you can walk another 5 miles around the Playa!

name: Wet Dreams
description: Camp Wet Dreams will offer respite to overworked, underslept, busy urban playa dwellers by offering them the one thing that¬ís hard to get on the hardpan metropolis: Sleep. Catch a few Zees in one of our sustainably powered, air-conditioned SnoozePods during operational hours.

name: Wheelie Camp
description: We are back and ready to Pop Some Wheelies in Black Rock City! You don‚Äôt even need a bike to wheelie, we will show you how! Come by for a cold beer or beverage and have some fun with some wheelie cool people!

name: Where's Waldo? Camp
description: Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Join your old pal Waldo as he adventures through the wacky wonderland of Black Rock City. The search is on! Have YOU found Waldo yet?

name: Whiskey & Whores Saloon
description: We got Whiskey, we got Whores, what else do you F-ing need??!! World-famous striptease contest, stage-hogging troubadours, the wheel of retardation, East Coast Party, and a lil something for art cars: Calling all whores‚Ä¶stop in for a shot of the best rot gut this side of the Mississippi!

name: Whiskey and Dust
description: We are a Whiskey (and wine) camp with a small yoga problem. We capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Healing, and amazing hand Jobs). At the same time be challenging and creative to show the community something, anything, new and different.

name: White Dragon Noodle Bar
description: If you sumo, you get in the VIP line for vegan shiitake mushroom noodles.  We also serve the lovely leg opener and the disturbing concentrated liquid evil.  Every day at sundown.  Daytime workshops and discussions.

name: White Trash Superstars
description: Join us for our 2nd year as the White Trash Superstars! We‚Äôre bringing back our community stage & stripper pole, pink lemonade stand, w/lots of shade, couches & Music. Plan on WT wrestling and get a camp stamp airbrush tattoo. Find us by our Redneck Battle Truck or white picket fence w/Astro turf )*(

name: Wine Man & Brew Cat Camp
description: Many of you already know the Wine Man.  He‚Äôs been serving wine on various playas since 2004.  This year, he‚Äôs getting hitched to the Amira, the Brew Cat at Burning Man.  They‚Äôll be serving home brews of fresh fruit wines and beer with all their dear friends of the playa.

name: Wishing Star
description: Wish upon a Star! Come to Wishing Star Camp and make a Wish that will burn in the Temple to join the Stars in the heavens. Will you Wish for something for yourself? A friend? Money/Fame/Power? Health/Love/Knowledge/Peace? That special friend? A long hot shower? We Wish you positive intentions.

name: World Wild Wall
description: The World Wild Wall will bring a piece of our city world into the desert. Using the most common human object to communicate even in the middle of nowhere. Pass by to build those wall‚Äôs and leave your most burning feelings to the community !!!

name: Yellow Gorilla Lounge
description: The Yellow Gorilla Lounge is a 800 sq. ft. hexagonal tent with a 165 sq. ft. hexagonal stage at the center and an interior illuminated by an array of led lights, gel cells for performances, and lasers.  The stage, surrounded by couches, is available for anyone in need of a venue.

name: Yes Please
description: Yes Please is the answer to every question!  Come meet sexy, open-minded, international, friendly, dancing, writhing people, and be sure to visit our transformative Non-Monogamy Advice Booth, occasionally staffed by real sexologists!

name: Yes! Have Some
description: The Tiki Gods rage against the intruding urban landscape at the ‚ÄúYes! Have Some‚Äù camp. Sacrifice your sobriety to the Angry Tiki Gods during the sundown rituals each evening as an escape from the looming Metropolis. Partake in a variety of Tiki-themed attractions.  Lounge, drink, play.

name: Yoshiwara
description: How about a cold pickle or a Gherkin Martini? The Gherkin Lounge is the hot spot of the martini set located in the (Camp) Yoshiwara district. The three story interior is reminiscent of the Eternal Gardens. During the day, ice cold pickles at our Tickle Me Pickle Stand. At night, Martinis and Music.

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Home to the fabulous Yum Cart. Hospitality services by day and Rumi readings by night.

name: Yurt Cafe
description: The Yurt Cafe will feature afternoon tea, shady refuge, and impromptu dust storm parties.

name: ZanZibar Lounge & Bar
description: Returning again, bringing lots of requested Playa love back.  If you have a playa mood necklace, you already know us from the past 8 years! Come have a drink, dance, relax, whatever and enjoy what we‚Äôre spinning and chill in our beautiful Moroccan bar and lounge.

name: Zark HQ
description: Meet the artist and team working on the honoraria art sculpture- Zark.

name: Zenbobway
description: SHOW us your inner & OUTER GLOW you little FREAK! ADD a touch of VASELINE to shimmer. FLAUNT your fluorescence.   The PsycoDelic BlacklIGHT MUSEUM is ALIVE! INTERacting+creATING+eVOLvinG=??!?? HANG out, BURN out, CHILL out, MAKE out, FREAK out! Come one, GLOW ALL!  Shine on you crazy burner.

name: Zombie Survival Training Camp
description: Zombie Survival Training Camp is quite possibly one of the last  defenses we have to protect and prepare ourselves for the coming zombie  apocalypse. Come join the resistance and learn a new approach to radical self reliance.

name: Zondernaam
description: Community Closet and Chill Space. We have a colorful shady daytime oasis (complete with Reclinerator), for relaxing to lounge music and enjoying good company. Our daytime Community Closet rack is full of crazy sparkly shiny sexy items‚Ä¶and our motto is, ‚ÄúTake a piece, leave a hug!‚Äù

name: Zoom!
description: As people continue to crowd into Earth¬ís vast metropolises, living congested lives and depleting Earth¬ís resources, the promise of a utopian life in a moon colony becomes more appealing every day. Visit the ZOOM Lunar Estates office to learn more about the wonders of lunar life!
